trans-unit.source: Sets IP_TOS IP level options on platforms where this is implemented. The behavior and allowed range varies between different systems. The option is ignored on platforms where it is not implemented. Use with caution.
trans-unit.target: 在实现此功能的平台上设置 IP_TOS IP 级别选项。行为和允许范围在不同系统之间有所不同。该选项在未实现的平台上被忽略。请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets net_ticktime (see kernel(6)) to NetTicktime seconds. TransitionPeriod defaults to 60.
trans-unit.target: 将 net_ticktime （请参阅 kernel(6) ）设置为 NetTicktime 秒。 TransitionPeriod 默认为 60 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a conditional breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 设置条件断点。

trans-unit.source: Sets a function breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 设置函数断点。

trans-unit.source: Sets a line breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 设置断线点。

trans-unit.source: Sets a link to the parent process (like spawn_link/3 does).
trans-unit.target: 设置到父进程的链接（就像 spawn_link/3 一样）。

trans-unit.source: Sets a lock on Id (using set_lock/3). If this succeeds, Fun() is evaluated and the result Res is returned. Returns aborted if the lock attempt fails. If Retries is set to infinity, the transaction does not abort.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Id 的锁定（使用 set_lock/3 ）。如果成功，将评估 Fun() 并返回结果 Res 。如果锁定尝试失败，则返回 aborted 。如果“ Retries 设置为 infinity ，则事务不会中止。

trans-unit.source: Sets a lock on the specified nodes (or on all nodes if none are specified) on ResourceId for LockRequesterId. If a lock already exists on ResourceId for another requester than LockRequesterId, and Retries is not equal to 0, the process sleeps for a while and tries to execute the action later. When Retries attempts have been made, false is returned, otherwise true. If Retries is infinity, true is eventually returned (unless the lock is never released).
trans-unit.target: 在 ResourceId 上为 LockRequesterId 的指定节点（或所有未指定的节点）上设置锁定。如果 ResourceId 上已经存在除 LockRequesterId 之外的其他请求者的锁，并且 Retries 不等于 0 ，则该过程休眠一会儿，然后尝试稍后执行该操作。当 Retries 的尝试已经进行了， false 则返回，否则 true 。如果 Retries 是 infinity ，则最终将返回 true （除非永不释放锁）。

trans-unit.source: Sets a network namespace for the socket. Parameter Namespace is a filename defining the namespace, for example, "/var/run/netns/example", typically created by command ip netns add example. This option must be used in a function call that creates a socket, that is, gen_tcp:connect/3,4, gen_tcp:listen/2, gen_udp:open/1,2 or gen_sctp:open/0,1,2, and also getifaddrs/1.

Sets a network namespace for the socket. Parameter Namespace is a filename defining the namespace, for example, "/var/run/netns/example", typically created by command ip netns add example. This option must be used in a function call that creates a socket, that is, gen_tcp:connect/3,4, gen_tcp:listen/2, gen_udp:open/1,2, or gen_sctp:open/0,1,2.
trans-unit.target: 设置套接字的网络名称空间。参数 Namespace 是定义名称空间的文件名，例如 "/var/run/netns/example" ，通常由命令 ip netns add example 创建。必须在创建套接字的函数调用中使用此选项，即 gen_tcp:connect/3,4 ， gen_tcp:listen/2 ， gen_udp:open/1,2 或 gen_sctp:open/0,1,2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new Value for environment variable VarName.
trans-unit.target: 为环境变量 VarName 设置新的 Value 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new directory for the object code. The current directory is used for output, except when a directory has been specified with this option.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象代码的新目录。当前的目录用于输出,除非用该选项指定了一个目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new timetrap for the running test case.
trans-unit.target: 为正在运行的测试用例设置一个新的定时器。

trans-unit.source: Sets a new value to a variable. The variable is created if it does not exist. No checks are made on the type of the new value.
trans-unit.target: 给一个变量设置新的值。如果变量不存在,则创建该变量。不对新值的类型进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Sets a temporary reboot command. This command is used if a HEART_COMMAND other than the one specified with the environment variable is to be used to reboot the system. The new Erlang runtime system uses (if it misbehaves) environment variable HEART_COMMAND to reboot.
trans-unit.target: 设置临时重启命令。如果要使用环境变量指定的 HEART_COMMAND 以外的其他命令来重新引导系统，则使用此命令。新的Erlang运行时系统使用（如果行为不当）环境变量 HEART_COMMAND 重新启动。

trans-unit.source: Sets a time limit for the complete expect operation. After TotalTimeout milliseconds, {error,timeout} is returned. Default is infinity (that is, no time limit).
trans-unit.target: 为完整的 expect 操作设置时间限制。在 TotalTimeout 毫秒后，将返回 {error,timeout} 。默认值为 infinity （即无时间限制）。

trans-unit.source: Sets a time-out on a connection when no channels are active. Defaults to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 当没有通道处于活动状态时，设置连接超时。默认为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a time-out on a connection when no channels are open. Defaults to infinity. The unit is milliseconds.
Sets a time-out on a connection when no channels are open. Defaults to infinity.
Sets a timeout on the transport layer connect time. For gen_tcp the time is in milli-seconds and the default value is infinity.
trans-unit.target: 在传输层连接时间上设置超时。对于 gen_tcp ，时间以毫秒为单位，默认值为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: Sets a timer on the driver, which will count down and call the driver when it is timed out. Parameter time is the time in milliseconds before the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: 在驱动程序上设置一个计时器，该计时器将倒计时并在超时时调用驱动程序。参数 time 是计时器到期之前的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Sets a user-defined CPU topology. The user-defined CPU topology overrides any automatically detected CPU topology. The CPU topology is used when binding schedulers to logical processors.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户定义的CPU拓扑。用户定义的CPU拓扑将覆盖所有自动检测到的CPU拓扑。将 binding schedulers to logical processors 时，将使用CPU拓扑。

trans-unit.source: Sets all flags except silent.
trans-unit.target: 设置除 silent 以外的所有标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets all trace flags except tracer and cpu_timestamp, which are in their nature different than the others.
trans-unit.target: 设置除 tracer 和 cpu_timestamp 之外的所有跟踪标志，它们本质上与其他标志不同。

trans-unit.source: Sets an ErlNifPid variable as undefined. See enif_is_pid_undefined.
Sets an additional message appended to the trace message sent. One can only set one additional message in the body. Later calls replace the appended message.
trans-unit.target: 设置发送的跟踪信息后附加的附加信息。在正文中只能设置一条附加信息。以后的调用会替换附加信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets and gets limits that will be used for controlling the busy state of the port message queue.
trans-unit.target: 设置并获取用于控制端口消息队列繁忙状态的限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets and unsets the busy state of the port. If on is non-zero, the port is set to busy. If it is zero, the port is set to not busy. You typically want to combine this feature with the busy port message queue functionality.

Sets and unsets the busy state of the port. If on is non-zero, the port is set to busy. If it is zero, the port is set to not busy. You typically want to combine this feature with the busy port message queue functionality.
trans-unit.target: 设置和取消设置端口的繁忙状态。如果 on 为非零，则端口设置为忙。如果为零，则端口设置为不忙。您通常希望将此功能与 busy port message queue 功能结合使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets are collections of elements with no duplicate elements. An ordset is a representation of a set, where an ordered list is used to store the elements of the set. An ordered list is more efficient than an unordered list. Elements are ordered according to the Erlang term order.
trans-unit.target: 集是没有重复元素的元素集合。一个 ordset 是一组，其中，一个有序列表用于存储所述一组中的元素的表示。有序列表比无序列表更有效。元素根据Erlang术语顺序排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets are collections of elements with no duplicate elements. The representation of a set is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 集合是元素的集合,没有重复的元素。集合的表示方法没有定义。

trans-unit.source: Sets certain flags for the process Pid, in the same manner as process_flag/2. Returns the old value of the flag. The valid values for Flag are only a subset of those allowed in process_flag/2, namely save_calls.
trans-unit.target: 以与 process_flag/2 相同的方式为进程 Pid 设置某些标志。返回标志的旧值。 Flag 的有效值只是 process_flag/2 中允许的值的一部分，即 save_calls 。

trans-unit.source: Sets default scheduler hint for port parallelism. If set to true, the virtual machine schedules port tasks when it improves parallelism in the system. If set to false, the virtual machine tries to perform port tasks immediately, improving latency at the expense of parallelism. Default to false. The default used can be inspected in runtime by calling erlang:system_info(port_parallelism). The default can be overridden on port creation by passing option parallelism to erlang:open_port/2

Sets default scheduler hint for port parallelism. If set to true, the virtual machine schedules port tasks when it improves parallelism in the system. If set to false, the virtual machine tries to perform port tasks immediately, improving latency at the expense of parallelism. Default to false. The default used can be inspected in runtime by calling erlang:system_info(port_parallelism). The default can be overridden on port creation by passing option parallelism to erlang:open_port/2
trans-unit.target: 为端口并行设置默认的调度程序提示。如果设置为 true ，则虚拟机将在提高系统并行性时调度端口任务。如果设置为 false ，则虚拟机将尝试立即执行端口任务，从而以牺牲并行度为代价来改善延迟。默认为 false 。可以在运行时通过调用 erlang:system_info(port_parallelism) 来检查使用的默认值。通过将选项 parallelism 传递给 erlang:open_port/2 ,可以在创建端口时覆盖默认值

trans-unit.source: Sets entry I of the array to Value. If I is not a non-negative integer, or if the array has fixed size and I is larger than the maximum index, the call fails with reason badarg.
trans-unit.target: 将数组的条目 I 设置为 Value 。如果 I 不是一个非负整数，或者如果数组具有固定的大小并且 I 大于最大索引，则调用失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Sets flags for how the control driver entry function will return data to the port owner process. (The control function is called from erlang:port_control/3.)
Sets flags for how the control driver entry function will return data to the port owner process. (The control function is called from erlang:port_control/3.)
trans-unit.target: 设置有关 control 驱动程序进入功能如何将数据返回到端口所有者进程的标志。（ control 函数从 erlang:port_control/3 调用。）

trans-unit.source: Sets how many call frames are to be fetched when inspecting the call stack. Does not affect other Attach Process windows.
trans-unit.target: 设置在检查调用栈时要获取多少个调用帧。不影响其他Attach Process窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets how many call frames to be fetched when inspecting the call stack from the Attach Process window. Does not affect existing Attach Process windows.
trans-unit.target: 设置从Attach Process窗口检查调用栈时,要获取多少个调用帧。不影响现有的Attach Process窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets how to save call frames in the stack, see int:stack_trace/1.
trans-unit.target: 设置如何在堆栈中保存调用帧，请参见 int:stack_trace/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets limits that will be used for controlling the busy state of the port message queue.
Sets limits that will be used for controlling the busy state of the port.
Sets module log level for the given modules. Equivalent to calling
trans-unit.target: 为给定模块设置模块日志级别。相当于调用

trans-unit.source: Sets of Unicode characters are defined as belonging to certain scripts. A character from one of these sets can be matched using a script name, for example:
trans-unit.target: Unicode字符集被定义为属于某些脚本。这些字符集中的一个字符可以使用脚本名称进行匹配,例如:

trans-unit.source: Sets of test cases, called test case groups, can also be defined. A test case group can have execution properties associated with it. Execution properties specify if the test cases in the group are to be executed in random order, in parallel, or in sequence, and if the execution of the group is to be repeated. Test case groups can also be nested (that is, a group can, besides test cases, contain subgroups).
Sets one or more options for a socket.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个插座的一个或多个选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets options according to Options for socket Socket.
trans-unit.target: 根据socket的 Socket Options 设置选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets options according to Options for socket SslSocket.
Sets options to be used for subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: 设置以后申请时要使用的选项。

trans-unit.source: Sets or clears flag sensitive for the current process. When a process has been marked as sensitive by calling process_flag(sensitive, true), features in the runtime system that can be used for examining the data or inner working of the process are silently disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置或清除对当前进程 sensitive 的标志。当通过调用 process_flag(sensitive, true) 将某个进程标记为敏感时，将自动禁用运行时系统中可用于检查数据或进程内部工作的功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets port in command mode.
trans-unit.target: 将端口设置为 command 模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets port in data mode.
trans-unit.target: 将端口设置为 data 模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets port in intermediate mode.
trans-unit.target: 将端口设置为 intermediate 模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets pretty printing of lists to Strings. The previous value of the flag is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将列表的漂亮打印设置为 Strings 。返回该标志的先前值。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler bind type.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度器绑定类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler busy wait threshold. Defaults to medium. The threshold determines how long schedulers are to busy wait when running out of work before going to sleep.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度程序繁忙等待阈值。默认为 medium 。该阈值确定了工作量耗尽后调度程序要等待多长时间才能进入睡眠状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler hint for port parallelism. If set to true, the virtual machine schedules port tasks; when doing so, it improves parallelism in the system. If set to false, the virtual machine tries to perform port tasks immediately, improving latency at the expense of parallelism. The default can be set at system startup by passing command-line argument +spp to erl(1).
trans-unit.target: 为端口并行设置调度程序提示。如果设置为 true ，则虚拟机计划端口任务；这样做可以改善系统中的并行性。如果设置为 false ，则虚拟机将尝试立即执行端口任务，从而以牺牲并行度为代价来改善延迟。可以在系统启动时通过将命令行参数 +spp 传递给 erl(1) 来设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler wake cleanup threshold. Defaults to medium. Controls how eager schedulers are to be requesting wakeup because of certain cleanup operations. When a lazy setting is used, more outstanding cleanup operations can be left undone while a scheduler is idling. When an eager setting is used, schedulers are more frequently woken, potentially increasing CPU-utilization.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度程序唤醒清除阈值。默认为 medium 。控制由于某些清理操作而急切的调度程序如何请求唤醒。当使用惰性设置时，可以在调度程序空闲时放弃更出色的清理操作。使用急切设置时，调度程序会更频繁地唤醒，从而有可能提高CPU利用率。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler wakeup strategy. Default strategy changed in ERTS 5.10 (Erlang/OTP R16A). This strategy was known as proposal in Erlang/OTP R15. The legacy strategy was used as default from R13 up to and including R15.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度程序唤醒策略。默认策略已在ERTS 5.10（Erlang / OTP R16A）中更改。该策略在Erlang / OTP R15中被称为 proposal 。该 legacy 战略作为从R13默认直至并包括R15。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler wakeup threshold. Defaults to medium. The threshold determines when to wake up sleeping schedulers when more work than can be handled by currently awake schedulers exists. A low threshold causes earlier wakeups, and a high threshold causes later wakeups. Early wakeups distribute work over multiple schedulers faster, but work does more easily bounce between schedulers.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度程序唤醒阈值。默认为 medium 。该阈值确定当存在的工作量大于当前唤醒的调度程序可以处理的工作量时，何时唤醒睡眠的调度程序。低阈值会导致较早的唤醒，而高阈值会导致较晚的唤醒。提早唤醒可以更快地将工作分配到多个调度程序中，但是工作在调度程序之间更容易反弹。

trans-unit.source: Sets scheduler-forced wakeup interval. All run queues are scanned each Interval milliseconds. While there are sleeping schedulers in the system, one scheduler is woken for each non-empty run queue found. Interval default to 0, meaning this feature is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 设置调度程序强制的唤醒间隔。每个 Interval 毫秒扫描一次所有运行队列。当系统中有睡眠调度程序时，将为找到的每个非空运行队列唤醒一个调度程序。 Interval 默认为 0 ，表示此功能被禁用。

trans-unit.source: Sets super carrier size (in MB). Defaults to 0, that is, the super carrier is by default disabled. The super carrier is a large continuous area in the virtual address space. mseg_alloc always tries to create new carriers in the super carrier if it exists. Notice that the alloc_util framework can create sys_alloc carriers. For more information, see +MMsco.
trans-unit.target: 设置超级载波大小（以MB为单位）。默认值为 0 ，即默认情况下禁用超级载波。超级载波是虚拟地址空间中的一个大连续区域。如果存在，则 mseg_alloc 始终尝试在超级载波中创建新载波。注意， alloc_util 框架可以创建 sys_alloc 载体。有关更多信息，请参见 +MMsco 。

trans-unit.source: Sets system flag fullsweep_after. Number is a non-negative integer indicating how many times generational garbage collections can be done without forcing a fullsweep collection. The value applies to new processes, while processes already running are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 设置系统标志 fullsweep_after 。 Number 是一个非负整数，指示在不强制进行全扫描收集的情况下，可以进行多少代垃圾收集。该值适用于新进程，而已运行的进程不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets system flags for erts_alloc(3). Alloc is the allocator to affect, for example binary_alloc. F is the flag to change and V is the new value.
trans-unit.target: 为 erts_alloc(3) 设置系统标志。 Alloc 是要影响的分配器，例如 binary_alloc 。 F 是要更改的标志，而 V 是新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets system profiler options. ProfilerPid is a local process identifier (pid) or port receiving profiling messages. The receiver is excluded from all profiling. The second argument is a list of profiling options:
trans-unit.target: 设置系统分析器选项。 ProfilerPid 是本地进程标识符（pid）或用于接收分析消息的端口。接收者从所有配置文件中排除。第二个参数是性能分析选项的列表：

trans-unit.source: Sets table options. The only allowed option to be set after the table has been created is heir. The calling process must be the table owner.
trans-unit.target: 设置表格选项。创建表后唯一设置的允许选项是 heir 。调用过程必须是表所有者。

trans-unit.source: Sets tcp socket options on the tcp-socket below an ssh connection.
Sets the "progress" of the initialization program. The init:get_status/0 function returns the current value of the progress, which is {InternalStatus,Term}.
trans-unit.target: 设置初始化程序的“进度”。该 init:get_status/0 函数返回的进步，这是电流值 {InternalStatus,Term} 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the socket path for the communication with the agent.
Sets the system directory.
Sets the user directory dynamically by evaluating the user2dir function.
Sets the user directory.

Sets the library path. If the given path is a list of directories, the set of library modules is determined by choosing the first module encountered while traversing the directories in the given order, for those modules that occur in more than one directory. By default, the library path is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 设置 library path 。如果给定路径是目录列表，则对于出现在多个目录中的那些模块，通过选择在以给定顺序遍历目录时遇到的第一个模块来确定 library modules 集。默认情况下，库路径为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transition_option() postpone() for this state transition. This action is ignored when returned from Module:init/1 or given to enter_loop/5,6, as there is no event to postpone in those cases.
Sets the transition_option()event_timeout() to Time with EventContent and time-out options Options.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EventContent 和超时选项 Options ,将 transition_option() event_timeout() 设置为 Time 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transition_option()generic_timeout() to Time for Name with EventContent and time-out options Options.
trans-unit.target: 通过 EventContent 和超时选项 Options ,将 transition_option() generic_timeout() 设置为 Time for Name 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transition_option()hibernate() for this state transition.
Sets the transition_option()hibernate() for this state transition.
trans-unit.target: 设置此状态转换的 transition_option() hibernate() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transition_option()postpone() for this state transition. This action is ignored when returned from Module:init/1 or given to enter_loop/5,6, as there is no event to postpone in those cases.
trans-unit.target: 设置此状态转换的 transition_option() postpone() 。从 Module:init/1 返回或提供给 enter_loop/5,6 时，将忽略此操作，因为在这些情况下，没有任何要延迟的事件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transition_option()state_timeout() to Time with EventContent and time-out options Options.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EventContent 和超时选项 Options ,将 transition_option() state_timeout() 设置为 Time 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SO_PRIORITY socket level option on platforms where this is implemented. The behavior and allowed range varies between different systems. The option is ignored on platforms where it is not implemented. Use with caution.
trans-unit.target: 在 SO_PRIORITY 它的平台上设置SO_PRIORITY套接字级别选项。行为和允许范围在不同系统之间有所不同。该选项在未实现的平台上被忽略。请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the max_heap_size process flag. The default max_heap_size is determined by command-line argument +hmax in erl(1). For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(max_heap_size, Size).
Sets the max_heap_size process flag. The default max_heap_size is determined by command-line argument +hmax in erl(1). For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(max_heap_size,Size).
trans-unit.target: 设置 max_heap_size 进程标志。默认 max_heap_size 由命令行参数测定 +hmax 在 erl(1) 。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(max_heap_size,Size) 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Sets the os_pid seen when doing erlang:port_info/2 on this port.
Sets the os_pid seen when doing erlang:port_info/2 on this port.
trans-unit.target: 套 os_pid 做时看到 erlang:port_info/2 此端口上。

trans-unit.source: Sets the EDNS version that inet_res(3) will use. The only allowed version is zero. Defaults to false, which means not to use EDNS.
trans-unit.target: 设置 inet_res(3) 将使用的EDNS版本。唯一允许的版本是零。默认为 false ，表示不使用EDNS。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SFTP root directory. Then the user cannot see any files above this root. If, for example, the root directory is set to /tmp, then the user sees this directory as /. If the user then writes cd /etc, the user moves to /tmp/etc.
trans-unit.target: 设置SFTP根目录。这样，用户将看不到该根目录之上的任何文件。例如，如果根目录设置为 /tmp ，那么用户会将此目录视为 / 。如果用户然后写入 cd /etc ，用户移动到 /tmp/etc 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SFTP version to use. Defaults to 5. Version 6 is under development and limited.
trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的SFTP版本。默认为5。版本6还在开发中,并受到限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the Type-Of-Service field on the IP datagrams that are sent, to the specified value. This effectively determines a prioritization policy for the outbound packets. The acceptable values are system-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 将发送的 IP 数据包上的服务类型字段设置为指定值。这有效地确定了出站数据包的优先级策略。可接受的值取决于系统。

trans-unit.source: Sets the account for an operation, if needed.
trans-unit.target: 必要时,设置操作的账户。

trans-unit.source: Sets the allowed UDP payload size inet_res(3) will advertise in EDNS queries. Also sets the limit when the DNS query will be deemed too large for UDP forcing a TCP query instead; this is not entirely correct, as the advertised UDP payload size of the individual nameserver is what is to be used, but this simple strategy will do until a more intelligent (probing, caching) algorithm needs to be implemented. Default to 1280, which stems from the standard Ethernet MTU size.
trans-unit.target: 设置允许的UDP有效负载大小 inet_res(3) 将在EDNS查询中播发。当DNS查询对于UDP而言太大而不能强制TCP查询时，也可以设置限制；这并不是完全正确的，因为将使用单个名称服务器的UDP UDP有效负载大小，但是在需要实现更智能的（探测，缓存）算法之前，这种简单的策略将起作用。默认值为1280，这源于标准以太网MTU大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the application configuration parameter Par to the value Val for the application Application; see app(4) and application(3).
Sets the application configuration parameter Par to the value Val for the application Application; see app(4) and application(3).
trans-unit.target: 将应用程序配置参数 Par 设置为应用程序 Application 的 Val 值；参见 app(4) 和 application(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the areas to be visible in an Attach Process window. Does not affect existing Attach Process windows.
trans-unit.target: 将区域设置为在“ Attach Process window 可见。不影响现有的“附加进程”窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets the attributes of Node to Attributes.
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的属性设置为 Attributes 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the code path to the list of directories Path.
trans-unit.target: 将代码路径设置为目录 Path 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the compatibility mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the conditional test of the breakpoint at Line in Module to Function.
trans-unit.target: 在设置断点的条件测试 Line 的 Module ，以 Function 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the conditional test of the breakpoint at Line in Module to Function. The function must fulfill the requirements specified in section Breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 在设置断点的条件测试 Line 的 Module ，以 Function 。该功能必须满足 Breakpoints 一节中指定的要求。

trans-unit.source: Sets the configuration Config for multiple applications. It is equivalent to calling set_env/4 on each application individually, except it is more efficient. The given Config is validated before the configuration is set.
Sets the current working directory of the file server to Dir. Returns ok if successful.
trans-unit.target: 将文件服务器的当前工作目录设置为 Dir 。如果成功，则返回 ok 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default binary virtual heap size of processes to the size Size.
trans-unit.target: 将进程的默认二进制虚拟堆大小设置为 Size 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default heap size of processes to the size Size.
trans-unit.target: 将进程的默认堆大小设置为 Size 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default maximum heap size of processes to the size Size. Defaults to 0, which means that no maximum heap size is used. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
Sets the default maximum heap size of processes to the size Size. Defaults to 0, which means that no maximum heap size is used. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
trans-unit.target: 将进程的默认最大堆大小设置为 Size 。默认值为 0 ，这意味着不使用最大堆大小。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default maximum heap size settings for processes. The size is specified in words. The new max_heap_size effects only processes spawned efter the change has been made. max_heap_size can be set for individual processes using spawn_opt/2,3,4 or process_flag/2.

Sets the default maximum heap size settings for processes. The size is specified in words. The new max_heap_size effects only processes spawned efter the change has been made. max_heap_size can be set for individual processes using spawn_opt/2,3,4 or process_flag/2.
trans-unit.target: 设置进程的默认最大堆大小设置。大小以字指定。新的 max_heap_size 效果仅在进行更改后才处理。 max_heap_size 可用于使用单个进程来设置 spawn_opt/2,3,4 或 process_flag/2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default minimum binary virtual heap size for processes. The size is specified in words. The new min_bin_vhheap_size effects only processes spawned after the change of min_bin_vheap_size has been made. min_bin_vheap_size can be set for individual processes by using spawn_opt/2,3,4 or process_flag/2.
trans-unit.target: 设置进程的默认最小二进制虚拟堆大小。大小以字指定。新的 min_bin_vhheap_size 效果仅在更改 min_bin_vheap_size 后产生。 min_bin_vheap_size 可以为单独的过程，通过使用被设置 spawn_opt/2,3,4 或 process_flag/2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default minimum heap size for processes. The size is specified in words. The new min_heap_size effects only processes spawned after the change of min_heap_size has been made. min_heap_size can be set for individual processes by using spawn_opt/4 or process_flag/2.
trans-unit.target: 设置进程的默认最小堆大小。大小以字指定。新的 min_heap_size 效果仅在更改 min_heap_size 后产生。 min_heap_size 可以为单独的过程，通过使用被设置 spawn_opt/4 或 process_flag/2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value for process flag message_queue_data. Defaults to on_heap. If +hmqd is not passed, on_heap will be the default. For more information, see process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).
Sets the default value for process flag message_queue_data. Defaults to on_heap. If +hmqd is not passed, on_heap will be the default. For more information, see process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).
trans-unit.target: 设置进程标志 message_queue_data 的默认值。默认为 on_heap 。如果未传递 +hmqd ，则 on_heap 将是默认值。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value for the array to Value.
trans-unit.target: 将数组的默认值设置为 Value 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value of one or more options. The options that can be set this way are:
trans-unit.target: 设置一个或多个选项的默认值。可以这样设置的选项有:

trans-unit.source: Sets the delayed node table garbage collection time (delayed_node_table_gc) in seconds. Valid values are either infinity or an integer in the range 0-100000000. Defaults to 60.
trans-unit.target: 设置延迟的节点表垃圾回收时间（ delayed_node_table_gc ），以秒为单位。有效值为 infinity 或0-100000000范围内的整数。默认值为60。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distribution buffer busy limit (dist_buf_busy_limit) in kilobytes. Valid range is 1-2097151. Defaults to 1024.
trans-unit.target: 以千字节为单位设置分发缓冲区繁忙限制（ dist_buf_busy_limit ）。有效范围是1-2097151。默认值为1024。

trans-unit.source: Sets the elements in Cols to the row specified by RowIndex. No checks are performed on the new values.
trans-unit.target: 将 Cols 中的元素设置为 RowIndex 指定的行。不检查新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the events a debugged process is to be attached to automatically. Affects existing debugged processes.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个被调试的进程要自动连接到的事件。影响现有的被调试进程。

trans-unit.source: Sets the exception handling of the evaluator process. The previous exception handling is returned. The default (false) is to kill the evaluator process when an exception occurs, which causes the shell to create a new evaluator process. When the exception handling is set to true, the evaluator process lives on, which means that, for example, ports and ETS tables as well as processes linked to the evaluator process survive the exception.
trans-unit.target: 设置评估程序的异常处理。返回先前的异常处理。缺省（ false ）是在发生异常时终止评估程序，这会导致Shell创建新的评估程序。当异常处理设置为 true 时，评估程序将继续存在，这意味着，例如，端口和ETS表以及链接到评估程序的程序将在异常中幸免。

trans-unit.source: Sets the exception handling of the evaluator process. The previous exception handling is returned. The default (false) is to kill the evaluator process when an exception occurs, which causes the shell to create a new evaluator process. When the exception handling is set to true, the evaluator process lives on. This means, for example, that ports and ETS tables as well as processes linked to the evaluator process survive the exception.
trans-unit.target: 设置评估程序的异常处理。返回先前的异常处理。缺省（ false ）是在发生异常时终止评估程序，这会导致Shell创建新的评估程序。当异常处理设置为 true 时，评估程序继续运行。例如，这意味着端口和ETS表以及链接到评估程序过程的过程可以保留该异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file owner. file:read_file_info/1.
Sets the file owner. file:read_file_info/1.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件所有者。 file:read_file_info/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file position of the file referenced by Handle. Returns {ok, NewPosition} (as an absolute offset) if successful, otherwise {error, reason()}. Location is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 设置 Handle 引用的文件的文件位置。如果成功，则返回 {ok, NewPosition} （作为绝对偏移量），否则返回 {error, reason()} 。 Location 是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: Sets the file transfer type to ascii or binary. When an FTP session is opened, the default transfer type of the server is used, most often ascii, which is default according to RFC 959.
trans-unit.target: 将文件传输类型设置为 ascii 或 binary 。当打开FTP会话时，将使用服务器的默认传输类型，最常见的是 ascii ，根据 RFC 959 的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the group leader of Pid to GroupLeader. Typically, this is used when a process started from a certain shell is to have another group leader than init.
trans-unit.target: 将 Pid 的组长设置为 GroupLeader 。通常，当某个进程从某个Shell启动时要拥有另一个组长而不是 init 时，将使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the group that the file owner belongs to. file:read_file_info/1.
Sets the group that the file owner belongs to. file:read_file_info/1.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件所有者所属的组。 file:read_file_info/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the host OS environment variable Variable to the value Value for the Erlang runtime system. Example:
trans-unit.target: 设置主机OS环境变量 Variable 的值 Value 的Erlang运行时系统。例：

trans-unit.source: Sets the individual Component of the trace token to Val. Returns the previous value of the component.
trans-unit.target: 将跟踪令牌的各个 Component 设置为 Val 。返回组件的先前值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial current working directory for the server.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器的初始当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial process dictionary size of processes to the size Size.
trans-unit.target: 将进程的初始进程字典大小设置为 Size 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the integer lists to be printed as strings. Does not affect existing debugged processes.
trans-unit.target: 将整数列表设置为字符串打印。不影响现有的调试过程。

trans-unit.source: Sets the intermediate buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 设置中间缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the last time, as POSIX time, when the file was read. See also file:read_file_info/1.
Sets the last time, as POSIX time, when the file was written. See also file:read_file_info/1.
Sets the last time, as POSIX time, when the file was read. See also file:read_file_info/1.
trans-unit.target: 将读取文件的最后时间设置为 POSIX time 。另请参阅 file:read_file_info/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the last time, as POSIX time, when the file was written. See also file:read_file_info/1.
trans-unit.target: 将最后一次写入文件的 POSIX time 设置为POSIX time。另请参阅 file:read_file_info/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit when rekeying is to be initiated. Both the max time and max amount of data could be configured:
trans-unit.target: 设置启动重钥时的限制。最大时间和最大数据量都可以配置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the line delimiting character for line-oriented protocols (line). Defaults to $\n.
trans-unit.target: 设置面向行的协议（ line ）的行定界字符。默认为 $\n 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of user annotations of Node to Annotations.
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的用户注释列表设置为 Annotations 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the local device for a multicast socket.
trans-unit.target: 设置多播套接字的本地设备。

trans-unit.source: Sets the lock category mask to the given categories.
trans-unit.target: 将锁定类别掩码设置为给定类别。

trans-unit.source: Sets the magic cookie of Node to Cookie and verifies the status of the authorization. Equivalent to calling erlang:set_cookie(Node, Cookie), followed by auth:is_auth(Node).
Sets the magic cookie of Node to Cookie and verifies the status of the authorization. Equivalent to calling erlang:set_cookie(Node,Cookie), followed by auth:is_auth(Node).
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的魔术cookie设置为 Cookie 并验证授权状态。等效于调用 erlang:set_cookie(Node,Cookie) ，然后调用 auth:is_auth(Node) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the magic cookie of Node to the atom Cookie. If Node is the local node, the function also sets the cookie of all other unknown nodes to Cookie (see section Distributed Erlang in the Erlang Reference Manual in System Documentation).

Sets the magic cookie of Node to the atom Cookie. If Node is the local node, the function also sets the cookie of all other unknown nodes to Cookie (see section Distributed Erlang in the Erlang Reference Manual in System Documentation).
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的魔术cookie设置为atom Cookie 。如果 Node 是本地节点，则该函数还将所有其他未知节点的cookie设置为 Cookie （请参见系统文档的Erlang参考手册中的 Distributed Erlang 部分）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the magic cookie of the node to Cookie; see erlang:set_cookie/2.
Sets the magic cookie of the node to Cookie; see erlang:set_cookie/2.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的魔术cookie设置为 Cookie ；参见 erlang:set_cookie/2 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the magic cookie used when connecting to Node. If Node is the current node, Cookie is used when connecting to all new nodes.
trans-unit.target: 设置连接到 Node 时使用的魔术cookie 。如果 Node 是当前节点，则在连接到所有新节点时将使用 Cookie 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the mapping of warning messages for error_logger. Messages sent to the error logger using one of the warning routines can be mapped to errors (+W e), warnings (+W w), or information reports (+W i). Defaults to warnings. The current mapping can be retrieved using error_logger:warning_map/0. For more information, see error_logger:warning_map/0 in Kernel.

Sets the mapping of warning messages for error_logger. Messages sent to the error logger using one of the warning routines can be mapped to errors (+W e), warnings (+W w), or information reports (+W i). Defaults to warnings. The current mapping can be retrieved using error_logger:warning_map/0. For more information, see error_logger:warning_map/0 in Kernel.
trans-unit.target: 设置 error_logger 的警告消息的映射。使用警告例程之一发送到错误记录器的消息可以映射为错误（ +W e ），警告（ +W w ）或信息报告（ +W i ）。默认为警告。可以使用 error_logger:warning_map/0 检索当前映射。有关更多信息，请参见内核中的 error_logger:warning_map/0 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum allowed length of the packet body. If the packet header indicates that the length of the packet is longer than the maximum allowed length, the packet is considered invalid. The same occurs if the packet header is too large for the socket receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据包主体的最大允许长度,如果数据包头显示数据包长度超过最大允许长度,则认为数据包无效。如果包头显示的包体长度超过最大允许长度,则认为该包无效。如果包头对于套接字接收缓冲区来说太大,也会出现同样的情况。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum allowed size of the packet body. If the packet header indicates that the length of the packet is longer than the maximum allowed length, the packet is considered invalid. Defaults to 0, which means no size limit.
trans-unit.target: 设置数据包主体的最大允许大小,如果数据包头显示数据包长度超过最大允许长度,则认为数据包无效。如果包头显示包的长度超过最大允许长度,则认为该包无效。默认值为0,表示没有大小限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum depth of call stack back-traces in the exit reason element of 'EXIT' tuples. The flag also limits the stacktrace depth returned by process_info item current_stacktrace.
trans-unit.target: 在 'EXIT' 元组的退出原因元素中设置调用堆栈回溯的最大深度。该标志还限制了 process_info 项 current_stacktrace. 返回的stacktrace深度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of ETS tables. This limit is partially obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 设置最大ETS表数。此限制已 partially obsolete 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of UDP packets to read without intervention from the socket when data is available. When this many packets have been read and delivered to the destination process, new packets are not read until a new notification of available data has arrived. Defaults to 5. If this parameter is set too high, the system can become unresponsive because of UDP packet flooding.
trans-unit.target: 设置在数据可用时无需套接字干预即可读取的最大UDP数据包数。当读取了这么多的数据包并将其传送到目标进程后，新的数据包才被读取，直到有可用数据的新通知到达为止。默认为 5 。如果此参数设置得太高，由于UDP数据包泛洪，系统可能会变得无响应。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of atoms the virtual machine can handle. Defaults to 1,048,576.
trans-unit.target: 设置虚拟机可处理的最大原子数。默认值为 1,048,576。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously existing ports for this system if a Number is passed as value. Valid range for Number is [1024-134217727]
trans-unit.target: 如果将数字作为值传递，则设置此系统同时存在的最大端口数。有效范围 Number 是 [1024-134217727]

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously existing processes for this system if a Number is passed as value. Valid range for Number is [1024-134217727]
trans-unit.target: 如果将 Number 作为值传递，则设置此系统同时存在的最大进程数。有效范围 Number 是 [1024-134217727]

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum time the test case is allowed to execute. If this time is exceeded, the test case fails with reason timetrap_timeout. Notice that init_per_testcase and end_per_testcase are included in the timetrap time. For details, see section Timetrap Time-Outs.
trans-unit.target: 设置允许测试用例执行的最长时间。如果超过该时间，则测试用例失败，原因为 timetrap_timeout 。请注意， init_per_testcase end_per_testcase 中包含init_per_testcase和end_per_testcase。有关详细信息，请参阅“ Timetrap Time-Outs 节。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of a file containing the list of user groups for user authentication. The filename can be either absolute or relative to the server_root. If the plain storage method is used, the group file is a plain text file, where each line contains a group name followed by a colon, followed by the members usernames separated by spaces.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含用于用户身份验证的用户组列表的文件的名称。文件名可以是绝对文件名，也可以是相对于 server_root 的文件名。如果使用纯存储方法，则组文件是纯文本文件，其中每行包含一个组名，后跟一个冒号，然后是成员用户名，并用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of a file containing the list of users and passwords for user authentication. The filename can be either absolute or relative to the server_root. If using the plain storage method, this file is a plain text file where each line contains a username followed by a colon, followed by the non-encrypted password. If usernames are duplicated, the behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 设置包含用户列表和用于用户身份验证的密码的文件的名称。文件名可以是绝对文件名，也可以是相对于 server_root 的文件名。如果使用纯存储方法，则此文件是纯文本文件，其中每行包含一个用户名，一个冒号，一个非加密密码。如果用户名重复，则行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: Sets the name of the authorization realm (auth-domain) for a directory. This string informs the client about which username and password to use.
trans-unit.target: 设置目录的授权领域(auth-domain)的名称。这个字符串会告诉客户端要使用的用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Sets the named (or default) value to value. Calls the Win32 API function RegSetValueEx(). The value can be of three types, and the corresponding registry type is used. The supported types are the following:
trans-unit.target: 将命名（或默认）值设置为 value 。调用Win32 API函数 RegSetValueEx() 。该值可以是三种类型，并使用相应的注册表类型。支持的类型如下：

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of IO poll threads to use when polling for I/O. The maximum number of poll threads allowed is 1024. The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 设置I/O轮询时要使用的IO轮询线程数。允许的最大轮询线程数为1024。默认值为1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of IO pollsets to use when polling for I/O. This option is only used on platforms that support concurrent updates of a pollset, otherwise the same number of pollsets are used as IO poll threads. The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 设置在对I/O进行轮询时要使用的IO pollsets的数量,这个选项只在支持并发更新pollset的平台上使用,否则,IO轮询线程使用相同数量的pollsets。该选项仅在支持并发更新pollset的平台上使用,否则将使用相同数量的pollset作为IO轮询线程。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to create and dirty CPU scheduler threads to set online. The maximum for both values is 1024, and each value is further limited by the settings for normal schedulers:
trans-unit.target: 设置dirty CPU调度线程的创建数量和dirty CPU调度线程的在线设置数量。这两个值的最大值为1024,每个值都会受到普通调度器的设置的进一步限制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of dirty CPU schedulers online. Range is 1 <= DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline <= N, where N is the smallest of the return values of erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) and erlang:system_info(schedulers_online).
trans-unit.target: 设置联机的脏CPU调度程序的数量。范围是 1 <= DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline <= N ，其中 N 是 erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) 和 erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) 的最小返回值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of dirty I/O scheduler threads to create. Valid range is 0-1024. By default, the number of dirty I/O scheduler threads created is 10, same as the default number of threads in the async thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 设置要创建的脏I / O调度程序线程的数量。有效范围是0-1024。默认情况下，创建的脏I / O调度程序线程数为10，与 async thread pool 的默认线程数相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of dirty I/O scheduler threads to create. Valid range is 1-1024. By default, the number of dirty I/O scheduler threads created is 10.
Sets the number of previous commands to keep in the history list to N. The previous number is returned. Defaults to 20.
trans-unit.target: 集以前的命令的数量保持在历史列表 N 。返回先前的号码。默认为20

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of results from previous commands to keep in the history list to N. The previous number is returned. Defaults to 20.
trans-unit.target: 设置从以前的命令结果的数量保持在历史列表 N 。返回先前的号码。默认为20

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of scheduler threads to create and scheduler threads to set online. The maximum for both values is 1024. If the Erlang runtime system is able to determine the number of logical processors configured and logical processors available, Schedulers defaults to logical processors configured, and SchedulersOnline defaults to logical processors available; otherwise the default values are 1. Schedulers can be omitted if :SchedulerOnline is not and conversely. The number of schedulers online can be changed at runtime through erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedulersOnline).
trans-unit.target: 设置要创建的调度程序线程的数量和要联机设置的调度程序线程的数量。对于这两个值的最大是1024。如果Erlang运行时系统能够确定逻辑处理器被配置和逻辑处理器可用，的数量 Schedulers 默认为逻辑处理器配置，并且 SchedulersOnline 默认为可用的逻辑处理器; 否则默认值是1。 Schedulers 是否可以省略 :SchedulerOnline 不是反之亦然。在线调度程序的数量可以在运行时通过 erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedulersOnline) 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of scheduler threads to create and scheduler threads to set online. The maximum for both values is 1024. If the Erlang runtime system is able to determine the number of logical processors configured and logical processors available, Schedulers defaults to logical processors configured, and SchedulersOnline defaults to logical processors available; otherwise the default values are 1. If the emulator detects that it is subject to a CPU quota, the default value for SchedulersOnline will be limited accordingly.
Sets the number of schedulers online. Range is 1 <= SchedulersOnline <= erlang:system_info(schedulers).
trans-unit.target: 设置在线调度程序的数量。范围是 1 <= SchedulersOnline <= erlang:system_info(schedulers) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of seconds a connection can be inactive before epmd times out and closes the connection. Defaults to 60.
trans-unit.target: 设置在 epmd 超时并关闭连接之前，连接可以处于非活动状态的秒数。默认值为60。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of threads in async thread pool. Valid range is 0-1024. Defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 设置异步线程池的线程数。有效范围是0-1024。默认值为1。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of threads in async thread pool. Valid range is 1-1024. The async thread pool is used by linked-in drivers to handle work that may take a very long time. Since OTP 21 there are very few linked-in drivers in the default Erlang/OTP distribution that uses the async thread pool. Most of them have been migrated to dirty IO schedulers. Defaults to 1.
Sets the path of the loader if init(3) interprets a path command in the start script.
trans-unit.target: 如果 init(3) 解释启动脚本中的 path 命令，则设置加载程序的路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the port owner (the connected port) to Pid. Roughly the same as Port ! {Owner, {connect, Pid}} except for the following:
trans-unit.target: 将端口所有者（连接的端口）设置为 Pid 。与 Port ! {Owner, {connect, Pid}} 大致相同！{Owner，{connect，Pid}}，以下内容除外：

trans-unit.source: Sets the port owner of Portto NewPid. The old port owner Pid stays linked to the port and must call unlink(Port) if this is not desired.
trans-unit.target: 设置的端口所有者 Port 到 NewPid 。旧的端口所有者 Pid 保持与端口的 unlink(Port) 如果不需要，则必须调用unlink（Port）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the port owner of Portto NewPid. Unless the port is already closed, the port replies with{Port,connected} to the old port owner. Note that the old port owner is still linked to the port, but the new port owner is not.
trans-unit.target: 设置的端口所有者 Port 到 NewPid 。除非该端口已关闭，否则该端口将以 {Port,connected} 答复旧端口所有者。请注意，旧的端口所有者仍链接到该端口，但新的端口所有者未链接。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position information of Node to Pos.
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的位置信息设置为 Pos 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the position of UserData as defined for files in file:position/2
Sets the position of UserPrivate as defined for files in file:position/2
trans-unit.target: 设置为 file:position/2 中的文件定义的 UserPrivate 的位置

trans-unit.source: Sets the position of the file referenced by IoDevice to Location. Returns {ok, NewPosition} (as absolute offset) if successful, otherwise {error, Reason}. Location is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 将 IoDevice 引用的文件的位置设置为 Location 。如果成功，则返回 {ok, NewPosition} （作为绝对偏移量），否则返回 {error, Reason} 。 Location 是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: Sets the post-comments of Node to Comments. Comments should be a possibly empty list of abstract comments, in top-down textual order
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的后注释设置为 Comments 。 Comments 应该是自上而下的文本顺序的抽象注释的可能为空的列表

trans-unit.source: Sets the pre-comments of Node to Comments. Comments should be a possibly empty list of abstract comments, in top-down textual order.
trans-unit.target: 将 Node 的预注释设置为 Comments 。 Comments 应该是自上而下的文本顺序的抽象注释的可能空列表。

trans-unit.source: Sets the priority of the new process. Equivalent to executing process_flag(priority, Level) in the start function of the new process, except that the priority is set before the process is selected for execution for the first time. For more information on priorities, see process_flag(priority, Level).

Sets the priority of the new process. Equivalent to executing process_flag(priority,Level) in the start function of the new process, except that the priority is set before the process is selected for execution for the first time. For more information on priorities, see process_flag(priority,Level).
trans-unit.target: 设置新进程的优先级。等同于在新流程的启动功能中执行 process_flag(priority,Level) ，除了在首次选择要执行的流程之前设置优先级。有关优先级的更多信息，请参见 process_flag(priority,Level) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the process priority. Level is an atom. Four priority levels exist: low, normal, high, and max. Default is normal.
trans-unit.target: 设置进程优先级。 Level 是一个原子。存在四个优先级： low ， normal ， high 和 max 。默认为 normal 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the process that will receive the logging messages generated by ERTS. If set to undefined, all logging messages generated by ERTS will be dropped. The messages will be in the format:
Sets the proxy configuration, equivalent to calling

Sets the range of characters that the system considers printable in heuristic detection of strings. This typically affects the shell, debugger, and io:format functions (when ~tp is used in the format string).
trans-unit.target: 设置系统在字符串的启发式检测中认为可打印的字符范围。这通常会影响Shell，调试器和 io:format 函数（在格式字符串中使用 ~tp 时）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the reply tag to ReplyTag in the reply message. That is, in the success or error message that is sent to the caller due to the spawn operation. The default reply tag is the atom spawn_reply.
Sets the shell prompt function to PromptFunc. The previous prompt function is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将shell提示功能设置为 PromptFunc 。返回前一个提示功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified trace flags on the specified processes or ports. Flag timestamp is always turned on.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的进程或端口上设置指定的跟踪标志。标记 timestamp 始终处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the stack trace option, see section Stack Trace. Does not affect existing debugged processes.
trans-unit.target: 设置堆栈跟踪选项，请参见“ Stack Trace 部分。不影响现有的调试过程。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the message_queue_data process flag. MQD is to be either off_heap or on_heap. The default message_queue_data process flag is determined by command-line argument +hmqd in erl(1). For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data, MQD).

Sets the state of the message_queue_data process flag. MQD is to be either off_heap or on_heap. The default message_queue_data process flag is determined by command-line argument +hmqd in erl(1). For more information, see the documentation of process_flag(message_queue_data,MQD).
trans-unit.target: 设置 message_queue_data 处理标志的状态。 MQD 是要要么 off_heap 或 on_heap 。默认 message_queue_data 处理标志是通过命令行参数测定 +hmqd 在 erl(1) 。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(message_queue_data,MQD) 的文档。

trans-unit.source: Sets the system directory, containing the host key files that identify the host keys for ssh. Defaults to /etc/ssh.
trans-unit.target: 设置系统目录，其中包含标识 ssh 主机密钥的主机密钥文件。默认为 /etc/ssh 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the system performance monitoring options. MonitorPid is a local process identifier (pid) receiving system monitor messages. The second argument is a list of monitoring options:
trans-unit.target: 设置系统性能监视选项。 MonitorPid 是一个本地进程标识符（pid），用于接收系统监视器消息。第二个参数是监视选项的列表：

trans-unit.source: Sets the system tracer. The system tracer can be either a process, port or tracer module denoted by Tracer. Returns the previous value (which can be false if no system tracer is active).
trans-unit.target: 设置系统跟踪器。系统跟踪器可以是 Tracer 表示的进程，端口或 tracer module 。返回前一个值（如果没有系统跟踪器处于活动状态，则可以为 false ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text strings that the daemon sends to the client for presentation to the user when using keyboard-interactive authentication.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用 keyboard-interactive 身份验证时，守护程序发送给客户端以呈现给用户的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the three diffie-hellman-group-exchange parameters that guides the connected server in choosing a group. See RFC 4419 for the details. The default value is {1024, 6144, 8192}.
trans-unit.target: 设置三个diffie-hellman-group-exchange参数，这些参数指导连接的服务器选择组。有关详细信息，请参见 RFC 4419 。默认值为 {1024, 6144, 8192} 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time, as POSIX time, when the file was created. See also file:read_file_info/1.
Sets the time, as POSIX time, when the file was created. See also file:read_file_info/1.
trans-unit.target: 将创建文件的时间设置为 POSIX time 。另请参阅 file:read_file_info/1 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the time-out in milliseconds when communicating with the agent via the socket. The default value is 1000.

Sets the trace token for the calling process to Token. If Token == [] then tracing is disabled, otherwise Token should be an Erlang term returned from get_token/0 or set_token/1. set_token/1 can be used to temporarily exclude message passing from the trace by setting the trace token to empty like this:
trans-unit.target: 将调用过程的跟踪令牌设置为 Token 。如果 Token == [] 则禁用跟踪，否则 Token 应该是从 get_token/0 或 set_token/1 返回的Erlang术语。通过将跟踪令牌设置为空，可以使用 set_token/1 暂时排除从跟踪传递的消息，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Sets the trace token to empty for all processes on the local node. The process internal counters used to create the serial of the trace token is set to 0. The trace token is set to empty for all messages in message queues. Together this will effectively stop all ongoing sequential tracing in the local node.
trans-unit.target: 将本地节点上所有进程的跟踪令牌设置为空。用于创建跟踪令牌序列的进程内部计数器被设置为0。 对于消息队列中的所有消息,跟踪令牌被设置为空。这一起将有效地停止本地节点中所有正在进行的顺序跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Sets the trigger action of the breakpoint at Line in Module to Action.
trans-unit.target: 在设置断点的触发动作 Line 的 Module 来 Action 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of authentication database that is used for the directory. The key difference between the different methods is that dynamic data can be saved when Mnesia and Dets are used.

Sets the type of authentication database that is used for the directory. The key difference between the different methods is that dynamic data can be saved when Mnesia and Dets are used. This property is called AuthDbType in the Apache-like configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于目录的身份验证数据库的类型。不同方法之间的主要区别在于，使用Mnesia和Dets时可以保存动态数据。在类似Apache的配置文件中，此属性称为 AuthDbType 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user directory. That is, the directory containing ssh configuration files for the user, such as known_hosts, id_rsa, id_dsa>, id_ecdsa and authorized_key. Defaults to the directory normally referred to as ~/.ssh.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户目录。即，包含用户的 ssh 配置文件的目录，例如 known_hosts ， id_rsa ， id_dsa >， id_ecdsa 和 authorized_key 。默认为通常称为 ~/.ssh 的目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the user-defined CpuTopology. The user-defined CPU topology overrides any automatically detected CPU topology. By passing undefined as CpuTopology, the system reverts to the CPU topology automatically detected. The returned value equals the value returned from erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) before the change was made.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户定义的 CpuTopology 。用户定义的CPU拓扑将覆盖所有自动检测到的CPU拓扑。通过将 undefined 传递为 CpuTopology ，系统将恢复为自动检测到的CPU拓扑。返回的值等于更改前从 erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) 返回的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of an environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 设置环境变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of configuration parameter Par for Application.
trans-unit.target: 设置配置参数的值 Par 的 Application 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the get_size option on the distribution channel identified by DHandle. This option controls the return value of calls to erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) where DHandle equals DHandle used when setting this option. When the get_size option is:
Sets the value of the node trace control word to TCW, which is to be an unsigned integer. For more information, see function set_tcw in section "Match Specifications in Erlang" in the User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 将节点跟踪控制字的值设置为 TCW ，这将是一个无符号整数。有关更多信息，请参见《用户指南》中“匹配Erlang中的规范”部分中的 set_tcw 函数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the source, as returned by module_info(compile).
trans-unit.target: 设置source的值，由 module_info(compile) 返回。

trans-unit.source: Sets the wanted time-out value for the server to set up a request connection.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器建立请求连接的超时值。

trans-unit.source: Sets thread-specific data associated with key for the calling thread. You are only allowed to set thread-specific data for threads while they are fully under your control. For example, if you set thread-specific data in a thread calling a driver callback function, it must be cleared, that is, set to NULL, before returning from the driver callback function.
trans-unit.target: 设置与调用线程的 key 关联的特定于线程的数据。仅当线程完全在您的控制之下时，才可以为它们设置线程特定的数据。例如，如果在调用驱动程序回调函数的线程中设置线程专用数据，则在从驱动程序回调函数返回之前，必须将其清除，即设置为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace pattern for message receiving. Must be combined with erlang:trace/3 to set the 'receive' trace flag for one or more processes. By default all messages received by 'receive' traced processes are traced. To limit traced receive events based on the message content, the sender and/or the receiver, use erlang:trace_pattern/3.
trans-unit.target: 设置跟踪模式以接收消息。必须与 erlang:trace/3 结合使用才能为一个或多个进程设置 'receive' 跟踪标志。默认情况下， 'receive' 跟踪“接收”跟踪的进程接收到的所有消息。要基于消息内容，发送方和/或接收方限制跟踪的接收事件，请使用 erlang:trace_pattern/3 。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace pattern for message sending. Must be combined with erlang:trace/3 to set the send trace flag for one or more processes. By default all messages sent from send traced processes are traced. To limit traced send events based on the message content, the sender and/or the receiver, use erlang:trace_pattern/3.
trans-unit.target: 设置消息发送的跟踪模式。必须与 erlang:trace/3 组合以设置一个或多个进程的 send 跟踪标志。默认情况下， send 跟踪从发送跟踪进程发送的所有消息。要基于消息内容，发送方和/或接收方限制跟踪的发送事件，请使用 erlang:trace_pattern/3 。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace patterns on global function calls.
trans-unit.target: 设置全局函数调用的跟踪模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace patterns on local and global function calls.
trans-unit.target: 设置本地和全局函数调用的跟踪模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace patterns on messages.
trans-unit.target: 设置消息的跟踪模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a Unix Domain Socket. See inet:local_address()
Sets up a Unix Domain Socket. See inet:local_address()
trans-unit.target: 设置Unix域套接字。见 inet:local_address()

trans-unit.source: Sets up a connection to Node. Returns pong if it is successful, otherwise pang.
trans-unit.target: 建立与 Node 的连接。如果成功则返回 pong ，否则返回 pang 。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a connection to an Erlang node.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个与Erlang节点的连接。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a socket to listen on port Port on the local host.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个套接字以侦听本地主机上的端口 Port 。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a socket to listen on the IP address and port number it is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个套接字监听它所绑定的IP地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the socket for IPv4.
trans-unit.target: 设置IPv4的socket。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the socket for IPv4. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 设置IPv4的套接字。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the socket for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 设置IPv6的socket。

trans-unit.source: Sets verbosity for the designated process. For the lowest verbosity silence, nothing is printed. The higher the verbosity, the more is printed.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定进程的详细程度。对于最低的详细度 silence ，不会打印任何内容。详细程度越高，打印的越多。

trans-unit.source: Sets warning level to Number. Defaults to 1. To turn off warnings, use -W0.
trans-unit.target: 将警告级别设置为 Number 。默认为 1 。要关闭警告，请使用 -W0 。

trans-unit.source: Sets when and how to attach to a debugged process automatically, see int:auto_attach/2. Function defaults to the standard function used by Debugger.
trans-unit.target: 设置何时以及如何自动附加到调试的进程，请参阅 int:auto_attach/2 。 Function 默认为调试器使用的标准函数。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to kill processes reaching the maximum heap size or not. Default to true. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
Sets whether to kill processes reaching the maximum heap size or not. Default to true. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
trans-unit.target: 设置是否杀死达到最大堆大小的进程。默认为 true 。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to send an error logger message or not for processes reaching the maximum heap size. Defaults to true. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
Sets whether to send an error logger message or not for processes reaching the maximum heap size. Defaults to true. For more information, see process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize).
trans-unit.target: 设置是否为达到最大堆大小的进程发送错误记录器消息。默认为 true 。有关更多信息，请参见 process_flag(max_heap_size, MaxHeapSize) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets which areas are to be visible. Does not affect other Attach Process windows.
trans-unit.target: 设置哪些区域是可见的。不影响其他Attach Process窗口。

trans-unit.source: Setting File and Line
Setting TERM Environment Variable
Setting TERM environment variable
trans-unit.target: 设置TERM环境变量

trans-unit.source: Setting a driver monitor for loading eventually leads to one of the following messages being sent:
trans-unit.target: 设置驱动程序监视器进行 loading 最终会导致发送以下消息之一：

trans-unit.source: Setting a timer with the same Name while it is running will restart it with the new time-out value. Therefore it is possible to cancel a specific time-out by setting it to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时设置具有相同 Name 的计时器将使用新的超时值重新启动它。因此，可以通过将特定超时设置为 infinity 来取消它。

trans-unit.source: Setting the capture Type to binary gives:
trans-unit.target: 将捕获 Type 设置为 binary 可得到：

trans-unit.source: Setting the environment variable to a negative value does not reboot the runtime system until the crash dump file is completly written.
trans-unit.target: 将环境变量设置为负值,在崩溃转储文件完成写入之前,不会重启运行时系统。

trans-unit.source: Setting the shutdown time to anything other than infinity for a child of type supervisor can cause a race condition where the child in question unlinks its own children, but fails to terminate them before it is killed.
Setting these variables wrong may cause hard to detect runtime errors. If you need to change these values, really make sure that the values are correct.
trans-unit.target: 将这些变量设置错误可能会导致难以检测到运行时错误。如果您需要更改这些值，真正确保值是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Setting this flag to false is not supported on all systems. The flag is then ignored.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有系统都支持将此标志设置为 false 。该标志然后被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Setting this flag to false is possibly not supported on all systems. The flag is then ignored.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有系统都支持将此标志设置为 false 。该标志然后被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Setting this option on platforms where it does not exist is ignored. Getting this option with getopts/2 returns no value, that is, the returned list does not contain an {ipv6_v6only,_} tuple. On Windows, the option does not exist, but it is emulated as a read-only option with value true.
trans-unit.target: 在不存在的平台上设置此选项将被忽略。使用 getopts/2 获取此选项不会返回任何值，也就是说，返回的列表不包含 {ipv6_v6only,_} 元组。在Windows上，该选项不存在，但是将其模拟为只读选项，其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Setting this option to true allows you to distinguish between a connection that was closed normally, and one that was aborted (intentionally or unintentionally) by the TCP peer. A call to gen_tcp:recv/2 returns {error, econnreset}. In active mode, the controlling process receives a {tcp_error, Socket, econnreset} message before the usual {tcp_closed, Socket}, as is the case for any other socket error. Calls to gen_tcp:send/2 also returns {error, econnreset} when it is detected that a TCP peer has sent an RST.
trans-unit.target: 将此选项设置为 true 可让您区分正常关闭的连接和TCP对等方中止（有意或无意）的连接。调用 gen_tcp:recv/2 返回 {error, econnreset} 。在活动模式下，控制过程会在通常的 {tcp_closed, Socket} 之前收到 {tcp_error, Socket, econnreset} 消息，就像其他任何套接字错误一样。当检测到TCP对等体已发送RST时，对 gen_tcp:send/2 的调用也会返回 {error, econnreset} 。

trans-unit.source: Setting this timer while it is running will restart it with the new time-out value. Therefore it is possible to cancel this time-out by setting it to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时设置此计时器将使用新的超时值重新启动它。因此，可以通过将其设置为 infinity 来取消此超时。

trans-unit.source: Setting up an Erlang tracer on a set of nodes and connecting trace clients to the ports of these tracers is not intuitive. In order to make this it easier the Event Tracer has a notion of global tracing. When used, the et_collector process will monitor Erlang nodes and when one connects, an Erlang tracer will automatically be started on the newly connected node. A corresponding trace client will also be started on the Collector node in order to automatically forward the trace Events to the Collector. Set the boolean parameter trace_global to true for either the et_collector or et_viewer in order to activate the global tracing. There is no restriction on how many concurrent (anonymous) collectors you can have, but you can only have one globalCollector as its name is registered in global.
trans-unit.target: 在一组节点上设置Erlang跟踪器并将跟踪客户端连接到这些跟踪器的端口并不直观。为了使其更容易， Event Tracer 具有全局跟踪的概念。使用时， et_collector 进程将监视Erlang节点，并且当一个连接时，将在新连接的节点上自动启动Erlang跟踪器。相应的跟踪客户端也将在 Collector 节点上启动，以便自动将跟踪 Events 转发到 Collector 。设置布尔参数 trace_global 到 true 的无论是 et_collector 或 et_viewer 为了激活全局跟踪。您可以有多少个并发（匿名）收集器没有限制，但是您只能有一个全局 Collector 因为其名称已在 global 中注册。

trans-unit.source: Several things are wrong with the messenger example in A Larger Example. For example, if a node where a user is logged on goes down without doing a logoff, the user remains in the server's User_List, but the client disappears. This makes it impossible for the user to log on again as the server thinks the user already is logged on.

trans-unit.source: Shutdown messages. If the process traps exits, it must be able to handle a shutdown request from its parent, the supervisor. Signal latency. Due to the previous synchronous implementation, latency of signals sent from processes to ports have usually been very low. During contention the latency has of course increased. Signal ordering guarantee. Signals from process X to port Y, must be delivered to Y in the same order as sent from X.

trans-unit.source: Signals to Erlang that the driver has encountered an EOF and is to be closed, unless the port was opened with option eof, in which case eof is sent to the port. Otherwise the port is closed and an 'EXIT' message is sent to the port owner process.
trans-unit.target: 向Erlang发出信号，表示驱动程序已遇到EOF，将被关闭，除非使用选项 eof 打开了端口，在这种情况下， eof 发送到该端口。否则，将关闭端口，并向端口所有者进程发送 'EXIT' 消息。

trans-unit.source: Signals to Erlang that the driver has encountered an error and is to be closed. The port is closed and the tuple {'EXIT', error, Err} is sent to the port owner process, where error is an error atom (driver_failure_atom and driver_failure_posix) or an integer (driver_failure).
trans-unit.target: 向Erlang发出信号，表明驱动程序遇到错误并将要关闭。端口被关闭，元组 {'EXIT', error, Err} 被发送到端口所有者进程，其中error是一个错误原子（ driver_failure_atom 和 driver_failure_posix ）或一个整数（ driver_failure ）。

trans-unit.source: Similar to +S but uses percentages to set the number of scheduler threads to create, based on logical processors configured, and scheduler threads to set online, based on logical processors available. Specified values must be > 0. For example, +SP 50:25 sets the number of scheduler threads to 50% of the logical processors configured, and the number of scheduler threads online to 25% of the logical processors available. SchedulersPercentage can be omitted if :SchedulersOnlinePercentage is not and conversely. The number of schedulers online can be changed at runtime through erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedulersOnline).

Similar to +S but uses percentages to set the number of scheduler threads to create, based on logical processors configured, and scheduler threads to set online, based on logical processors available. Specified values must be > 0. For example, +SP 50:25 sets the number of scheduler threads to 50% of the logical processors configured, and the number of scheduler threads online to 25% of the logical processors available. SchedulersPercentage can be omitted if :SchedulersOnlinePercentage is not and conversely. The number of schedulers online can be changed at runtime through erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedulersOnline).
trans-unit.target: 与 +S 相似，但使用百分比来设置基于已配置的逻辑处理器要创建的调度程序线程数，并基于可用的逻辑处理器来设置要联机设置的调度程序线程。指定的值必须>0。例如， +SP 50:25 会将调度程序线程数设置为已配置逻辑处理器的50％，将联机调度程序线程数设置为可用逻辑处理器的25％。 SchedulersPercentage 的话可以省略 :SchedulersOnlinePercentage 是不是反之。联机调度程序的数量可以在运行时通过 erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedulersOnline) 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Similar to +SDcpu but uses percentages to set the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to create and the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to set online. Specified values must be > 0. For example, +SDPcpu 50:25 sets the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to 50% of the logical processors configured and the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads online to 25% of the logical processors available. DirtyCPUSchedulersPercentage can be omitted if :DirtyCPUSchedulersOnlinePercentage is not and conversely. The number of dirty CPU schedulers online can be changed at runtime through erlang:system_flag(dirty_cpu_schedulers_online, DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline).

Similar to +SDcpu but uses percentages to set the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to create and the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to set online. Specified values must be > 0. For example, +SDPcpu 50:25 sets the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads to 50% of the logical processors configured and the number of dirty CPU scheduler threads online to 25% of the logical processors available. DirtyCPUSchedulersPercentage can be omitted if :DirtyCPUSchedulersOnlinePercentage is not and conversely. The number of dirty CPU schedulers online can be changed at runtime through erlang:system_flag(dirty_cpu_schedulers_online, DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline).
trans-unit.target: 与 +SDcpu 相似，但是使用百分比来设置要创建的脏CPU调度程序线程的数量和要在线设置的脏CPU调度程序线程的数量。指定的值必须大于0。例如， +SDPcpu 50:25 会将脏CPU调度程序线程数设置为已配置逻辑处理器的50％，将联机脏CPU调度程序线程数设置为可用逻辑处理器的25％。 DirtyCPUSchedulersPercentage 的话可以省略 :DirtyCPUSchedulersOnlinePercentage 是不是反之。可以在运行时通过 erlang:system_flag(dirty_cpu_schedulers_online, DirtyCPUSchedulersOnline) 更改联机的肮脏CPU调度程序的数量。

trans-unit.source: Similar to get_all_values/2, but each value is wrapped in a list unless it is already itself a list. The resulting list of lists is concatenated. This is often useful for "incremental" options.
trans-unit.target: 与 get_all_values/2 类似，但是每个值都包装在列表中，除非它本身已经是列表。列表的结果列表是串联的。这通常对于“增量”选项很有用。

trans-unit.source: Similar to parse/3, but does a more quick-and-dirty processing of the code. See quick_parse_file/2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 parse/3 类似，但是对代码的处理更加快捷。有关详细信息，请参见 quick_parse_file/2 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to parse_file/2, but does a more quick-and-dirty processing of the code. Macro definitions and other preprocessor directives are discarded, and all macro calls are replaced with atoms. This is useful when only the main structure of the code is of interest, and not the details. Furthermore, the quick-parse method can usually handle more strange cases than the normal, more exact parsing.
trans-unit.target: 与 parse_file/2 类似，但是对代码的处理更加快捷。宏定义和其他预处理程序指令将被丢弃，所有宏调用均被替换为原子。当仅关注代码的主要结构而不关注细节时，这很有用。此外，快速解析方法通常可以比正常，更精确的解析处理更多的异常情况。

trans-unit.source: Similar to parse_form/3, but does a more quick-and-dirty processing of the code. See quick_parse_file/2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 parse_form/3 相似，但是对代码的处理更加快捷。有关详细信息，请参见 quick_parse_file/2 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to text/1, but the result is treated as having zero width. This is regardless of the actual length of the string. Null text is typically used for markup, which is supposed to have no effect on the actual layout.

trans-unit.source: Similar to Busy, but for processor states that have been identified as non-busy (see below).

trans-unit.source: Similar to epmd -names, see erts:epmd(1). Host defaults to the local host. Returns the names and associated port numbers of the Erlang nodes that epmd registered at the specified host. Returns {error, address} if epmd is not operational.
trans-unit.target: 与 epmd -names 类似，请参阅 erts:epmd(1) 。 Host 默认为本地主机。返回 epmd 在指定主机上注册的Erlang节点的名称和相关的端口号。如果 epmd 无法运行 {error, address} 则返回{错误，地址}。

trans-unit.source: Similar to erl_receive_msg. The difference is that erl_xreceive_msg expects the buffer to have been allocated by malloc, and reallocates it if the received message does not fit into the original buffer. Therefore both buffer and buffer length are given as pointers; their values can change by the call.

trans-unit.source: Since fprof uses trace to file, the runtime performance degradation is minimized, but still far from negligible, especially for programs that use the filesystem heavily by themselves. Where you place the trace file is also important, e.g on Solaris /tmp is usually a good choice since it is essentially a RAM disk, while any NFS (network) mounted disk is a bad idea.
trans-unit.target: 由于 fprof 使用跟踪到文件，因此可以将运行时性能下降降到最低，但是仍然可以忽略不计，尤其是对于那些大量使用文件系统的程序而言。放置跟踪文件的位置也很重要，例如，在Solaris /tmp 上，通常是一个不错的选择，因为它本质上是RAM磁盘，而任何NFS（网络）安装的磁盘都是一个坏主意。

trans-unit.source: Since XSLT is based on a functional programming approach with pattern matching and recursion it is possible to write similar style sheets in Erlang. At least for basic transforms. This document describes how to use the XPath implementation together with Erlangs pattern matching and a couple of functions to write XSLT like transforms.
trans-unit.target: 由于XSLT是基于模式匹配和递归的函数式编程方法,所以在Erlang中也可以编写类似的样式表。至少对于基本的转换来说是如此。这篇文档描述了如何使用XPath实现和Erlang模式匹配以及一些函数来编写类似XSLT的变换。

trans-unit.source: Since a distributed application can move between nodes, some addressing mechanism is required to ensure that it can be addressed by other applications, regardless on which node it currently executes. This issue is not addressed here, but the global or pg2 modules in Kernel can be used for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 由于分布式应用程序可以在节点之间移动，因此需要某种寻址机制以确保它可以被其他应用程序寻址，而不管它当前在哪个节点上执行。此处未解决此问题，但是内核中的 global 或 pg2 模块可用于此目的。

trans-unit.source: Since a distributed application can move between nodes, some addressing mechanism is required to ensure that it can be addressed by other applications, regardless on which node it currently executes. This issue is not addressed here, but the global or pg modules in Kernel can be used for this purpose.

Since a postponed event is only retried after a state change, you have to think about where to keep a state data item. You can keep it in the server Data or in the State itself, for example by having two more or less identical states to keep a boolean value, or by using a complex state (see section Complex State) with callback modehandle_event_function. If a change in the value changes the set of events that is handled, then the value should be kept in the State. Otherwise no postponed events will be retried since only the server Data changes.

Since a postponed event is only retried after a state change, you have to think about where to keep a state data item. You can keep it in the server Data or in the State itself, for example by having two more or less identical states to keep a boolean value, or by using a complex state (see section Complex State) with Callback Modehandle_event_function. If a change in the value changes the set of events that is handled, then the value should be kept in the State. Otherwise no postponed events will be retried since only the server Data changes.
trans-unit.target: 由于仅在状态更改后才重试推迟的事件，因此您必须考虑将状态数据项保留在何处。你可以把它在服务器中 Data 或在 State 通过具有两个或多或少相同的状态，以保持一个布尔值，或使用复杂的状态（参见本身，例如 Complex State ）与 Callback Mode handle_event_function 。如果值的更改更改了要处理的事件集，则该值应保留在状态中。否则，因为只有服务器数据发生更改，所以不会重试任何延迟事件。

trans-unit.target: 由于应用往往是瞬时的(它们是动态加载和卸载的),所以对这些应用的管理也必须是动态的。例如,如果我们有一个机架的设备MIB和不同的板卡MIB,这些板卡可以安装在机架上,那么当板卡插入时,板卡的MIB应该被加载,当板卡取出时,MIB应该被卸载。

trans-unit.source: Since it is the port itself which decides when it is time to enter a busy state, it needs to be executing in order to enter the busy state. This since it has not been scheduled for execution yet. That is, under these circumstances the busy port functionality loose the flow control properties it was intended to provide.

Version 1 and 2 codec's ignore this option, if found.

trans-unit.source: Since we go from a state where I/O signals are the only port related signals scheduled, to a state where potentially all port related signals may be scheduled we may drastically increase the load on the run queue lock. The amount of scheduled port tasks very much depend on the Erlang application executing, which we do not control, and we do not want to get increased contention on the run queue locks. We therefore need another approach of protecting the port task queue.

Since we have a limited amount of unique identifiers, we need to be careful not to waste them. If previously used identifiers are reused too quick, identifiers originating from terminated processes will refer to newly created processes, and mixups will occur. The previously used approach was quite good at not wasting identifiers. Using a modified version of the same approach also lets us keep the ordering property that we have always had.

Since we have the average real-time and the percentage spent in each state we can easily calculate the time spent in each state by multiplying Average thread real-time with Thread state %, i.e. to get the time Scheduler 1 spent in the emulator state we do 1000513us * 0.13% = 1300us.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们有即时平均，以及我们可以很容易地通过相乘计算每个状态的时间每个状态所花费的百分比 Average thread real-time 与 Thread state % ，即获得在模拟器状态，我们所花费的时间安排器做 1000513us * 0.13% = 1300us 。

trans-unit.source: Since we still need to be able to pass references to memory between scheduler threads we need some way to manage this. An allocator instance belonging to one scheduler thread is only allowed to be manipulated by that scheduler thread. When other threads need to deallocate memory originating from a foreign allocator instance, they only pass the memory block to a "message box" containing deallocation jobs attached to the originating allocator instance. When a scheduler thread detects such deallocation job it performs the actual deallocation.

trans-unit.source: Slave nodes on other hosts than the current one are started with the rsh program. The user must be allowed to rsh to the remote hosts without being prompted for a password. This can be arranged in a number of ways (for details, see the rsh documentation). A slave node started on the same host as the master inherits certain environment values from the master, such as the current directory and the environment variables. For what can be assumed about the environment when a slave is started on another host, see the documentation for the rsh program.
trans-unit.target: 当前主机以外的其他主机上的从节点是通过 rsh 程序启动的。必须允许该用户 rsh 到远程主机，而不会提示您输入密码。可以通过多种方式进行安排（有关详细信息，请参见 rsh 文档）。与主服务器在同一主机上启动的从属节点从主服务器继承某些环境值，例如当前目录和环境变量。有关在另一个主机上启动从属服务器时可以假定的环境的信息，请参见 rsh 程序的文档。

trans-unit.source: Slave nodes on other hosts than the current one are started with the ssh program. The user must be allowed to ssh to the remote hosts without being prompted for a password. This can be arranged in a number of ways (for details, see the ssh documentation). A slave node started on the same host as the master inherits certain environment values from the master, such as the current directory and the environment variables. For what can be assumed about the environment when a slave is started on another host, see the documentation for the ssh program.

So, the value #'StartMessage'{msgId="home",content="Any Printable String"} is legal to encode as a StartMessage value. However, the value #'StartMessage'{msgId="remote", content="Some String"} is illegal as the constraint in StartMessage tells that when you have chosen a value from a specific object in object set GENERAL-PROCEDURES in field msgId, you must choose a value from that same object in the content field too. In this second case, it is to be any INTEGER value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值 #'StartMessage'{msgId="home",content="Any Printable String"} 合法地编码为 StartMessage 值。但是，值 #'StartMessage'{msgId="remote", content="Some String"} 是非法的，因为 StartMessage 中的约束表明，当您从对象集 GENERAL-PROCEDURES 中的特定对象中选择了一个值时，该字段位于 msgId 字段中，您还必须在内容字段中从同一对象中选择一个值。在第二种情况下，它将是任何 INTEGER 值。

trans-unit.source: Sockets are set 'non-blocking' when created, so this option is *not* available (as it would adversely effect the Erlang VM to set a socket 'blocking').

Soft upgrade according to the OTP release concept is not straight forward for the server side, as subsystem channel processes are spawned by the ssh application and hence added to its supervisor tree. The subsystem channels can be upgraded when upgrading the user application, if the callback functions can handle two versions of the state, but this function cannot be used in the normal way.
trans-unit.target: 对于服务器端而言，根据OTP发行版概念进行的软升级并非一帆风顺，因为 ssh 应用程序产生了子系统通道进程，因此将其添加到其主管树中。如果回调函数可以处理两个版本的状态，则在升级用户应用程序时可以升级子系统通道，但是不能以正常方式使用此函数。
