Solaris only. Defines if the service should be enabled (and disabled) inside (true) or outside (false) os_sup. For backwards compatibility reasons, the default is true. The recommended value is false, as the Erlang emulator should normally not be run with root privileges, as is required for enabling the service.
trans-unit.target: 仅Solaris。定义是在 os_sup 内部（ true ）还是外部（ false ）启用（和禁用）服务。出于向后兼容的原因，默认值为 true 。推荐值为 false ，因为Erlang仿真器通常不应以启用服务所需的 root 特权运行。

trans-unit.source: Solaris only. Defines the directory which contains the backup copy and the Erlang specific configuration files for syslogd, and a named pipe to receive the messages from syslogd. Default is "/etc".
trans-unit.target: 仅Solaris。定义目录，其中包含备份副本和 syslogd 的Erlang特定配置文件，以及一个命名管道，用于接收来自 syslogd 的消息。默认值为 "/etc" 。

trans-unit.source: Solaris only. Defines the full name of the configuration file for syslogd. Default is "/etc/syslog.conf".
trans-unit.target: 仅Solaris。定义 syslogd 的配置文件的全名。默认值为 "/etc/syslog.conf" 。

trans-unit.source: Solaris takes about 17 MB of RAM on a system with 64 MB of total RAM. This leaves about 47 MB for the applications. If the system uses swapping, these figures cannot be improved because unnecessary daemon processes are swapped out. However, if swapping is disabled, or if the swap space is of limited resource in the system, it becomes necessary to kill off unnecessary daemon processes.
trans-unit.target: 在一个总内存为64 MB的系统中,Solaris需要大约17 MB的内存。这就为应用程序留下了大约47 MB。如果系统使用交换,这些数字就无法改善,因为不必要的守护进程被交换掉了。但是,如果禁止交换,或者系统中的交换空间资源有限,那么就有必要杀掉不必要的守护进程。

trans-unit.source: Solaris: Solaris 10 (32-bit and 64-bit) and 9 (32-bit) are supported. The build requires a version of the GNU C compiler (gcc) that has been configured to use the GNU assembler (gas). Sun's x86 assembler is emphatically not supported.
trans-unit.target: Solaris：支持Solaris 10（32位和64位）和9（32位）。该生成需要已配置为使用GNU汇编程序（gas）的GNU C编译器（gcc）版本。强烈不支持Sun的x86汇编器。

trans-unit.source: Some communication is synchronous. If broken down into pieces, a synchronous communication operation consists of two asynchronous signals; one request signal and one reply signal. An example of such a synchronous communication is a call to erlang:process_info/2 when the first argument is not self(). The caller sends an asynchronous signal requesting information, and then waits for the reply signal containing the requested information. When the request signal reaches its destination, the destination process replies with the requested information.

Some communication is synchronous. If broken down into pieces, a synchronous communication operation consists of two asynchronous signals; one request signal and one reply signal. An example of such a synchronous communication is a call to erlang:process_info/2 when the first argument is not self(). The caller sends an asynchronous signal requesting information, and then waits for the reply signal containing the requested information. When the request signal reaches its destination, the destination process replies with the requested information.
trans-unit.target: 某些通信是同步的。如果分解为多个部分，则同步通信操作将由两个异步信号组成。一个请求信号和一个答复信号。这种同步通信的一个示例是当第一个参数不是 self() 时调用 erlang:process_info/2 。调用方发送一个异步信号请求信息，然后等待包含所请求信息的回复信号。当请求信号到达其目的地时，目的地进程将回复所请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: Some configuration parameters control the behavior of Reltool on system (sys) level. Others provide control on application (app) level and yet others are on module (mod) level. Module level parameters override application level parameters and application level parameters override system level parameters. Escript escript level parameters override system level parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一些配置参数控制Reltool在系统（ sys ）级别上的行为。其他提供对应用程序（ app ）级别的控制，而其他提供对模块（ mod ）级别的控制。模块级别参数覆盖应用程序级别参数，而应用程序级别参数覆盖系统级别参数。Escript escript 级别参数覆盖系统级别参数。

trans-unit.source: Some effort is made to keep the trace clean from unnecessary trace messages; tracing is started and stopped from a spawned process while the erlang:apply/2 call is made in the current process, only surrounded by receive and send statements towards the trace starting process. The trace starting process exits when not needed any more.
trans-unit.target: 采取了一些措施来保持跟踪的清洁，避免不必要的跟踪消息。在当前进程中进行 erlang:apply/2 调用时，将在生成的进程中启动和停止跟踪，仅在朝向跟踪启动进程的 receive 和 send 语句周围。当不再需要跟踪启动过程时，将退出。

trans-unit.source: Some instructions, such as select_val/3, essentially has a variable number of operands. Such instructions have a {list,[...]} operand as their last operand in the BEAM assembly code. For example:

Some locks in the system are static and protects global resources, for example bif_timers and the run_queue locks. Other locks are dynamic and not necessarily long lived, for example process locks and ets-table locks. The statistics data from short lived locks can be stored separately when the locks are deleted. This behavior is by default turned off to save memory but can be turned on via lcnt:rt_opt({copy_save, true}). The lcnt:apply/1,2,3 functions enables this behavior during profiling.
trans-unit.target: 系统中的某些锁是静态的，可以保护全局资源，例如 bif_timers 和 run_queue 锁。其他锁是动态的，并且不一定寿命长，例如进程锁和ets-table锁。删除锁时，可以将短期锁的统计数据单独存储。默认情况下，此行为是关闭的，以节省内存，但可以通过 lcnt:rt_opt({copy_save, true}) 。该 lcnt:apply/1,2,3 功能评测期间启用此行为。

trans-unit.source: Some native BIFs may need to get a consistent snapshot view of the active code. To do this it is important to only read the_active_code_index one time and then use that index value for all code accessing during the BIF. If a load operation is executed in parallel, reading the_active_code_index a second time might result in a different value, and thereby a different view of the code.

trans-unit.source: Some of the decode functions need a pre-allocated buffer. This buffer must be allocated large enough, and for non-compound types the ei_get_type() function returns the size required (notice that for strings an extra byte is needed for the NULL-terminator).

Some of the decode functions need a pre-allocated buffer. This buffer must be allocated large enough, and for non-compound types the ei_get_type() function returns the size required (notice that for strings an extra byte is needed for the NULL-terminator).
trans-unit.target: 一些解码功能需要预先分配的缓冲区。此缓冲区必须分配得足够大，对于非复合类型， ei_get_type() 函数将返回所需的大小（注意，对于字符串， NULL 终止符需要一个额外的字节）。

trans-unit.source: Some of the function has no defined return value (void()), they can of course return anything. But the functions that do have specified return value(s) must adhere to this. None of the functions can use exit of throw to return.
trans-unit.target: 一些函数没有定义的返回值（ void() ），它们当然可以返回任何东西。但是具有指定返回值的函数必须遵守此规定。没有一个函数可以使用throw的退出返回。

trans-unit.source: Some of the functions take a parameter of type ErlDrvBinary, a driver binary. It is to be both allocated and freed by the caller. Using a binary directly avoids one extra copying of data.
trans-unit.target: 一些函数采用 ErlDrvBinary 类型的参数（驱动程序二进制）。它由调用者分配和释放。直接使用二进制避免了额外的数据复制。

trans-unit.source: Some of the functions use a match specification, match_spec. For a brief explanation, see select/2. For a detailed description, see section Match Specifications in Erlang in ERTS User's Guide.
Some of the functions use a match specification, match_spec. For a brief explanation, see select/2. For a detailed description, see section Match Specifications in Erlang in ERTS User's Guide.

trans-unit.source: Some of the new BIFs on some systems, perhaps surprisingly, return negative integer values on a newly started runtime system. This is not a bug, but a memory use optimization.
trans-unit.target: 某些系统上的一些新的BIF,可能令人惊讶的是,在新启动的运行时系统上会返回负整数值。这不是一个错误,而是内存使用的优化。

trans-unit.source: Some of the send options (community, sec_model, sec_name, sec_level and max_message_size) are override options. That is, for this request, they override any configuration done when the agent was registered.
trans-unit.target: 一些发送选项（ community ， sec_model ， sec_name ， sec_level 和 max_message_size ）是 override options 。也就是说，对于此请求，它们将覆盖注册代理时完成的所有配置。

trans-unit.source: Some of the tests that come with erlang use native code to test. This means that when cross compiling erlang you also have to cross compile test suites in order to run tests on the target host. To do this you first have to release the tests as usual.
trans-unit.target: erlang自带的一些测试都是使用本地代码进行测试的,这意味着在交叉编译erlang时,你也要交叉编译测试套件,以便在目标主机上运行测试。这意味着当交叉编译erlang时,你也必须交叉编译测试套件,以便在目标主机上运行测试。要做到这一点,你首先要像往常一样发布测试。

trans-unit.source: Some options that can be passed to compile/2 can also be set by special items at the start of a pattern. These are not Perl-compatible, but are provided to make these options accessible to pattern writers who are not able to change the program that processes the pattern. Any number of these items can appear, but they must all be together right at the start of the pattern string, and the letters must be in upper case.

Some options that can be passed to compile/2 can also be set by special items at the start of a pattern. These are not Perl-compatible, but are provided to make these options accessible to pattern writers who are not able to change the program that processes the pattern. Any number of these items can appear, but they must all be together right at the start of the pattern string, and the letters must be in upper case.
trans-unit.target: 可以传递给 compile/2 的某些选项也可以在模式开始时由特殊项目设置。这些不是Perl兼容的，但是提供这些功能是为了使模式编写者可以访问这些选项，这些模式编写者无法更改处理模式的程序。可以出现任意数量的这些项目，但是它们必须在模式字符串的开始处都在一起，并且字母必须大写。

trans-unit.source: Some parts of OTP has had limited VxWorks support, such as for example erl_interface. This support is now deprecated and has also been scheduled for removal in OTP 23.

Some parts of OTP were designed a very long time ago and did not necessarily take today's computing environments into account. In some cases the consequences of those design decisions are too severe. This may be performance wise, scalability wise, etc. If we deem the consequences too severe, we might introduce incompatible changes. This kind of incompatibility will not be introduced in a patch, but instead in the next release.
trans-unit.target: OTP的某些部分是很久以前设计的,不一定考虑到今天的计算环境。在某些情况下,这些设计决定的后果过于严重。这可能是性能方面的,也可能是可扩展性方面的,等等。如果我们认为后果太严重,我们可能会引入不兼容的变化。这种不兼容的情况不会在补丁中引入,而是在下一个版本中引入。

trans-unit.source: Some registry values are stored as strings with references to environment variables, for example, %SystemRoot%Windows. trans-unit.source: Some things have changed from pg_sync.c: we use the entry ready_io for ready_input and ready_output, which is called from the emulator only when there is input to be read from the socket. (Actually, the socket is used in a select function inside the emulator, and when the socket is signaled, indicating there is data to read, the ready_input entry is called. More about this below.)
trans-unit.target: pg_sync.c 发生了一些变化：我们为 ready_input 和 ready_output 使用了 ready_io 条目，仅当要从套接字读取输入时才从模拟器调用它。（实际上，套接字是在仿真器内部的 select 函数中使用的，当发信号通知套接字时，表示有要读取的数据时，将 ready_input 条目。有关此内容的更多信息。）

Something is wrong with a fun F.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes (see table/2) traversal of tables can be done by looking up key values, which is assumed to be fast. Under certain (rare) circumstances there can be too many key values to look up. Option {max_lookup, MaxLookup} can then be used to limit the number of lookups: if more than MaxLookup lookups would be required, no lookups are done but the table is traversed instead. Defaults to infinity, which means that there is no limit on the number of keys to look up.
trans-unit.target: 有时（请参阅 table/2 ），可以通过查找键值来完成表的遍历，这被认为是快速的。在某些（罕见）情况下，可能有太多键值无法查找。然后，可以使用选项 {max_lookup, MaxLookup} 来限制查找次数：如果需要的查找次数超过 MaxLookup 的查找次数，则不执行任何查找，而是遍历该表。默认为 infinity ，这意味着查找键的数量没有限制。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a function may unexpectedly waste a lot (some 10 ms or more depending on host machine OS) of OWN (and ACC) time, even functions that does practically nothing at all. The problem may be that the OS has chosen to schedule out the Erlang runtime system process for a while, and if the OS does not support high resolution cpu time measurements fprof will use wallclock time for its calculations, and it will appear as functions randomly burn virtual machine time.
trans-unit.target: 有时，一个功能可能会意外地浪费很多时间（取决于主机操作系统，大约10毫秒或更长时间），并且浪费OWN（和ACC）时间，甚至是几乎什么都没做的功能。问题可能是操作系统选择将Erlang运行时系统进程安排了一段时间，如果操作系统不支持高分辨率的cpu时间测量， fprof 将使用挂钟时间进行计算，并且会作为随机刻录的函数出现。虚拟机时间。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an exception to the above rule has to be made to make new features (or even bug fixes) possible. A call to ei_set_compat_rel(release_number) sets the ei library in compatibility mode of OTP release release_number.
Sometimes communication between an Erlang program and another program using a standard protocol is desirable. Erlang/OTP currently supports TCP/IP and UDP sockets: as follows:
trans-unit.target: 有时需要使用标准协议在Erlang程序和另一个程序之间进行通信。Erlang / OTP当前支持TCP / IP和UDP 套接字：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes database queries can take a long time to complete, in our pg_sync driver, the emulator halts while the driver is doing its job. This is often not acceptable, as no other Erlang process gets a chance to do anything. To improve on our postgres driver, we re-implement it using the asynchronous calls in LibPQ.
trans-unit.target: 有时，数据库查询可能需要很长时间才能完成，在我们的 pg_sync 驱动程序中，模拟器在驱动程序完成工作时会暂停。这通常是不可接受的，因为其他Erlang进程没有机会做任何事情。为了改进我们的postgres驱动程序，我们使用LibPQ中的异步调用重新实现了它。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes events can arrive in any state of the gen_statem. It is convenient to handle these in a common state handler function that all state functions call for events not specific to the state.
trans-unit.target: 有时事件可以到达 gen_statem 的任何状态。在所有状态函数都调用非特定于该状态的事件的公共状态处理程序函数中处理它们很方便。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes in a system of ASN.1 modules, different default tag modes, for example, AUTOMATIC, IMPLICIT, or EXPLICIT. The multi-file compilation resolves the default tagging as if the modules were compiled separately.
trans-unit.target: 有时在 ASN.1 模块系统中，会使用不同的默认标记模式，例如 AUTOMATIC ， IMPLICIT 或 EXPLICIT 。多文件编译可以解析默认标记，就像模块是单独编译一样。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is desirable to open a zip archive, and to unzip files from it file by file, without having to reopen the archive. This can be done by functions zip_open/1,2, zip_get/1,2, zip_list_dir/1, and zip_close/1.
trans-unit.target: 有时，需要打开一个zip存档，并逐个文件从其中解压缩文件，而不必重新打开存档。这可以通过函数 zip_open/1,2 ， zip_get/1,2 ， zip_list_dir/1 和 zip_close/1 完成。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is impossible, or infeasible, to implement independent test cases. Maybe it is not possible to read the SUT state. Maybe resetting the SUT is impossible and it takes too long time to restart the system. In situations where test case dependency is necessary, CT offers a structured way to carry data from one test case to the next. The same mechanism can also be used to carry data from one test suite to the next.
trans-unit.target: 有时候,实现独立的测试用例是不可能的,或者说是不可行的。也许无法读取SUT状态。也许重置SUT是不可能的,而且重新启动系统需要花费太长的时间。在需要测试用例依赖性的情况下,CT提供了一种结构化的方式来将数据从一个测试用例带到下一个测试用例。同样的机制也可以用来将数据从一个测试套件传送到下一个测试套件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is not possible to retrieve the values for some of the objects in the notification specification with a get-operation. However, they are known when the send_notification function is called. This is the case if an object is an element in a table. It is possible to give the values of some objects to the send_notification function snmpa:send_notification(Agent, Notification, Receiver, Varbinds). In this function, Varbinds is a list of Varbind, where each Varbind is one of:

trans-unit.source: Sometimes test cases depend on each other so that if one case fails, the following tests are not to be executed. Typically, if the save_config facility is used and a test case that is expected to save data crashes, the following case cannot run. Common Test offers a way to declare such dependencies, called sequences.
trans-unit.target: 有时，测试用例彼此依赖，因此，如果一个用例失败，则将不执行以下测试。通常，如果使用 save_config 工具，并且预期要保存数据的测试用例将崩溃，则以下用例将无法运行。 Common Test 提供了一种声明这种依赖关系的方法，称为序列。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the escape sequence \K (see above) can be used instead of a lookbehind assertion to get round the fixed-length restriction.
trans-unit.target: 有时可以用转义序列\K(见上文)代替lookbehind断言来绕过固定长度的限制。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the system can enter a state where the reported memory from erlang:memory(total) is very different from the memory reported by the OS. This can be because of internal fragmentation within the Erlang Run-Time System. Data about how memory is allocated can be retrieved using erlang:system_info(allocator). The data you get from that function is very raw and not very plesant to read. recon_alloc can be used to extract useful information from system_info statistics counters.

Sometimes the system can enter a state where the reported memory from erlang:memory(total) is very different from the memory reported by the OS. This can be because of internal fragmentation within the Erlang Run-Time System. Data about how memory is allocated can be retrieved using erlang:system_info(allocator). The data you get from that function is very raw and not very plesant to read. recon_alloc can be used to extract useful information from system_info statistics counters.
trans-unit.target: 有时系统会进入一种状态，其中 erlang:memory(total) 所报告的内存与OS所报告的内存有很大差异。这可能是由于Erlang运行时系统内部的碎片。可以使用 erlang:system_info(allocator) 检索有关如何分配内存的数据。从该函数获得的数据非常原始，读取起来也不是很愉快。 recon_alloc 可用于从system_info统计信息计数器中提取有用的信息。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, an example says more than a thousand words. The following small Erlang module shows how EUnit can be used in practice.
trans-unit.target: 有时候,一个例子胜过千言万语。下面这个小的Erlang模块展示了EUnit如何在实践中使用。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, however, it can be useful to save all calls, even tail-recursive calls. This is done with option Stack On, Tail. Notice that this option consumes more memory and slows down execution of interpreted functions when there are many tail-recursive calls.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有时保存所有调用，甚至尾递归调用也很有用。这是通过选项Stack On，Tail完成的。请注意，当有许多尾递归调用时，此选项会占用更多内存并减慢解释函数的执行。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it can be convenient not to produce the whole set of test descriptions before the testing begins; for example, if you want to generate a huge amount of tests that would take up too much space to keep in memory all at once.
trans-unit.target: 有时,在测试开始之前,不生成整套测试描述可能会很方便;例如,如果你想生成大量的测试,而这些测试会占用太多空间,无法一次全部保存在内存中。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, testing some unit A (e.g., a function) requires that it collaborates somehow with some other unit B (perhaps being passed as an argument, or by reference) - but B has not been implemented yet. A "mock object" - an object which, for the purposes of testing A, looks and behaves like a real B - might then be used instead. (This is of course only useful if it would be significantly more work to implement a real B than to create a mock object.)
trans-unit.target: 有时，测试某个单元 A （例如，一个函数）需要它与某种其他单元 B 进行某种协作（也许作为参数传递或通过引用传递）-但是 B 尚未实现。然后可以使用“模拟对象”（出于测试 A 的目的，其外观和行为类似于真实 B 的对象)。（这当然仅在实现一个真正的 B 比创建一个模拟对象要花更多的工作时才有用。）

trans-unit.source: Sorts terms on files.
trans-unit.target: 对文件中的术语进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts tuples on files.
trans-unit.target: 对文件中的元组进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorts tuples on files. The sort is performed on the element(s) mentioned in KeyPos. If two tuples compare equal (==) on one element, the next element according to KeyPos is compared. The sort is stable.
trans-unit.target: 对文件中的元组进行排序。排序是在 KeyPos 中提到的元素上执行的。如果两个元组在一个元素上比较等于（ == ），则根据 KeyPos 比较下一个元素。排序是稳定的。

trans-unit.source: Source code can be reconstructed from the debug information. To prevent this, use encrypted debug information (see below).
trans-unit.target: 源代码可以从调试信息中重建。为了防止这种情况发生,请使用加密的调试信息(见下文)。

trans-unit.source: Source files from other languages that generate Erlang code, such as ASN.1 or Mibs, should be placed in directories, at the top level or in src, with the same name as the source language, for example asn1 and mibs. Build artifacts should be placed in their respective language directory, such as src for Erlang code or java_src for Java code.
trans-unit.target: 来自其他生成Erlang代码的语言（例如ASN.1或Mibs）的源文件应放在与源语言同名的顶级目录或 src 中，例如 asn1 和 mibs 。构建工件应放置在它们各自的语言目录中，例如 java_src 代码的 src 或Java代码的java_src。

trans-unit.source: Space
trans-unit.target: Space

trans-unit.source: Space characters between mark-up as space, tab and line feed are normalized and returned as xmlText records.
trans-unit.target: 标记之间的空格字符（如 space ， tab 和 line feed 已规范化并作为xmlText记录返回。

trans-unit.source: Space or tab only
trans-unit.target: 仅限空格或制表符

trans-unit.source: Space separator
trans-unit.target: 空间分隔器

trans-unit.source: Space.
trans-unit.target: Space.

trans-unit.source: Spacing mark
trans-unit.target: 间距标记

trans-unit.source: Spawns a new process and initializes it as described in the beginning of this manual page. The process is spawned using the erlang:spawn_opt BIFs.
Spawns a new process and initializes it as described in the beginning of this manual page. The process is spawned using the spawn BIFs.
trans-unit.target: 产生一个新进程，并按照本手册开始部分的说明对其进行初始化。使用 spawn BIF 生成该过程。

trans-unit.source: Spawns a new process and initializes it as described in the beginning of this manual page. The process is spawned using the spawn_link BIFs.
trans-unit.target: 产生一个新进程，并按照本手册开始部分的说明对其进行初始化。使用 spawn_link BIF生成该过程。

trans-unit.source: Spawns a new process and initializes it as described in the beginning of this manual page. The process is spawned using the spawn_opt BIFs.
trans-unit.target: 产生一个新进程，并按照本手册开始部分的说明对其进行初始化。使用 spawn_opt BIF生成该过程。

trans-unit.source: Spawns a process on the pool node that is expected to have the lowest future load.
trans-unit.target: 在池节点上启动一个预计未来负载最低的进程。

trans-unit.source: Spawns and links to a process on the pool node that is expected to have the lowest future load.
trans-unit.target: 在池节点上启动并链接到预计未来负荷最低的进程。

trans-unit.source: Special Flag for literal_alloc
trans-unit.target: literal_alloc的特殊标志

trans-unit.source: Special Flags
Special Set Transaction Mechanism

Specific BEAM instructions. The specific instructions are the instructions that are actually executed by the runtime system. They can be changed at any time without causing compatibility issues. The loader translates generic instructions to specific instructions. In general, for each generic instruction, there exists a family of specific instructions. The OTP 20 release has 389 specific instructions.
Specific for the event.
trans-unit.target: 活动的具体。

trans-unit.source: Specific functions to support this are create_subscription/1-6 and get_event_streams/1-3.
trans-unit.target: 支持此功能的特定功能是 create_subscription/1-6 和 get_event_streams/1-3 。

trans-unit.source: Specific generic time-outs can just as State Time-Outs be restarted or cancelled by setting it to a new time or infinity.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 State Time-Outs 设置为新时间或 infinity 可以像重新启动或取消状态超时那样，特定的通用超时。

trans-unit.source: Specific generic time-outs can just as state time-outs be restarted or cancelled by setting it to a new time or infinity.
Specifically, the application configuration parameters are automatically updated according to (in increasing priority order):
trans-unit.target: 具体来说,应用配置参数按照(优先级顺序递增)自动更新。

trans-unit.source: Specified .rel file File cannot be read or does not contain a single term.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 .rel 文件无法读取 File 或不包含单个术语。

trans-unit.source: Specified .rel file does not contain a recognized release specification, but another term Data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 .rel 文件不包含公认的发行说明，而是另一个术语 Data 。

trans-unit.source: Specified relup file Relup contains bad data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 relup 文件 Relup 包含错误的数据。

trans-unit.source: Specified release version Vsn is already in use.
trans-unit.target: 指定的发行版本 Vsn 已在使用中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies AVPs for which module Mod provides encode/decode functions. The section contents consists of AVP names. For each such name, Mod:Name(encode|decode, Type, Data, Opts) is expected to provide encode/decode for values of the AVP, where Name is the name of the AVP, Type is it's type as declared in the @avp_types section of the dictionary, Data is the value to encode/decode, and Opts is a term that is passed through encode/decode.
trans-unit.target: 指定Mod为其提供编码/解码功能的AVP。本节内容由AVP名称组成。对于每个这样的名称， Mod:Name(encode|decode, Type, Data, Opts) 有望为AVP的值提供编码/解码，其中Name是AVP的名称，Type是 @avp_types 声明的类型词典的avp_types部分，Data是要编码/解码的值，而Opts是通过编码/解码传递的术语。

trans-unit.source: Specifies Logger's compatibility with SASL Error Logging. See the kernel(6) manual page for more information about this parameter.
Specifies Logger's compatibility with SASL Error Logging. See the kernel(6) manual page for more information about this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定Logger与 SASL Error Logging 记录的兼容性。有关此参数的更多信息，请参见 kernel(6) 手册页。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a channel process to handle an SFTP subsystem.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个通道进程来处理SFTP子系统。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a formatter that the handler can use for converting the log event term to a printable string.
trans-unit.target: 指定处理程序可用于将日志事件项转换为可打印字符串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function for prettyprinting Erlang syntax trees. This is used for outputting the resulting module definition, as well as for creating stub files. The function is assumed to return formatted text for the given syntax tree, and should raise an exception if an error occurs. The default formatting function calls erl_prettypr:format/2.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于漂亮打印Erlang语法树的函数。这用于输出结果模块定义，以及用于创建存根文件。假定该函数返回给定语法树的格式化文本，并且在发生错误时应引发异常。默认的格式化函数调用 erl_prettypr:format/2 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function for prettyprinting Erlang syntax trees. This is used for outputting the resulting module definition. The function is assumed to return formatted text for the given syntax tree, and should raise an exception if an error occurs. The default formatting function calls erl_prettypr:format/2.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于漂亮打印Erlang语法树的函数。这用于输出结果模块定义。假定该函数返回给定语法树的格式化文本，并且在发生错误时应引发异常。默认的格式化函数调用 erl_prettypr:format/2 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function to be called each time a new log file is opened. The call M:F(A) is assumed to return {ok, Head}. The item Head is written first in each file. Head is to be a term if the format is internal, otherwise a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 指定每次打开新日志文件时要调用的函数。假定呼叫 M:F(A) 返回 {ok, Head} 。在每个文件中首先写入项 Head 。如果格式为 internal 格式，则应为 Head ，否则为字节序列。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function to be called each time a new log file is opened. The call M:F(A) is assumed to return {ok, Head}. The item Head is written first in each file. Head is to be a term if the format is internal, otherwise an iodata().

Specifies a header to be written first on the log file. If the log is a wrap log, the item Head is written first in each new file. Head is to be a term if the format is internal, otherwise a sequence of bytes. Defaults to none, which means that no header is written first on the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定要首先写入日志文件的标头。如果日志是自动换行日志，则项目 Head 将首先写入每个新文件中。如果格式为 internal 格式，则应为 Head ，否则为字节序列。默认为 none ，这意味着没有头首先写入文件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a header to be written first on the log file. If the log is a wrap log, the item Head is written first in each new file. Head is to be a term if the format is internal, otherwise an iodata(). Defaults to none, which means that no header is written first on the file.
Specifies a list of "pre-defined" macro definitions for the Erlang preprocessor, if used (cf. the preprocess option). The default value is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于Erlang预处理程序的“预定义”宏定义的列表（如果使用的话）（请参阅 preprocess 选项）。默认值为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of MIBs (including path) and defines which MIBs are initially loaded into the SNMP manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定MIB的列表(包括路径),并定义哪些MIB最初被加载到SNMP管理器中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of MIBs (including path) that defines which MIBs are initially loaded into the SNMP master agent.
trans-unit.target: 指定MIB的列表(包括路径),定义哪些MIB最初被加载到SNMP主代理中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of directory names for the Erlang preprocessor, if used, to search for include files (cf. the preprocess option). The default value is the empty list. The directory of the source file and the current directory are automatically appended to the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于Erlang预处理程序的目录名称列表（如果使用的话），以搜索包含文件（请参阅 preprocess 选项）。默认值为空列表。源文件的目录和当前目录会自动添加到列表中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of environment variables that will extend the environment.
trans-unit.target: 指定将扩展环境的环境变量列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of names of input modules such that calls to these "safe" modules may be turned into direct local calls, that do not test for code replacement. Typically, this can be done for e.g. standard library modules. If a module is "safe", it is per definition also "static" (cf. below). The list may be empty. By default, all involved modules except the target module are considered "safe".
trans-unit.target: 指定输入模块名称的列表，以便可以将对这些“安全”模块的调用转换为直接的本地调用，这些本地调用不会测试代码替换。通常，这可以针对例如标准库模块来完成。如果模块是“安全的”，则按照定义它也是“静态的”（请参见下文）。该列表可能为空。默认情况下，除目标模块外，所有涉及的模块均被视为“安全”。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of names of input modules which will be assumed never to be replaced (reloaded) unless the target module is also first replaced. The list may be empty. The target module itself (which may also be one of the input modules) is always regarded as "static", regardless of the value of this option. By default, all involved modules are assumed to be static.
trans-unit.target: 指定输入模块的名称列表,除非目标模块也被替换,否则这些模块将被认为永远不会被替换(重新加载)。这个列表可以是空的。无论这个选项的值是多少,目标模块本身(也可能是输入模块之一)总是被认为是 "静态的"。默认情况下,所有涉及的模块都被认为是静态的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of names of input modules whose interfaces should be exported by the output module. A stub descriptor is generated for each specified module, unless its name is Name. If no modules are specified, then if Name is also the name of an input module, that module will be exported; otherwise the first listed module in Sources will be exported. The default value is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 指定输入模块的名称列表，其接口应由输出模块导出。除非名称为 Name ，否则都会为每个指定的模块生成一个存根描述符。如果未指定模块，则如果 Name 也是输入模块的名称，则将导出该模块；否则，将导出该模块。否则，将导出“ Sources 列出的第一个模块。默认值为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of pairs of module names, representing a mapping from old names to new. The set of old names may not include any of the names of the input modules. All calls to the listed old modules will be rewritten to refer to the corresponding new modules. The redirected calls will not be further processed, even if the new destination is in one of the input modules. This option mainly exists to support module renaming; cf. rename/3. The default value is the empty list.
trans-unit.target: 指定模块名称对列表，代表从旧名称到新名称的映射。一组旧名称可能不包含任何输入模块的名称。对列出的旧模块的所有调用将被重写以引用相应的新模块。即使新的目的地在输入模块之一中，重定向的呼叫也不会得到进一步处理。此选项主要用于支持模块重命名。 cf. rename/3 。默认值为空列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of rules for associating object files with source files, to be passed to the function filelib:find_source/2. This can be used to change the way Igor looks for source files. If this option is not specified, the default system rules are used. The first occurrence of this option completely overrides any later in the option list.
trans-unit.target: 指定将目标文件与源文件相关联的规则列表，该规则列表将传递给函数 filelib:find_source/2 。这可用于更改Igor查找源文件的方式。如果未指定此选项，则使用默认系统规则。该选项的首次出现会完全覆盖选项列表中的所有后续内容。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a longest time to wait for a send operation to be accepted by the underlying TCP stack. When the limit is exceeded, the send operation returns {error,timeout}. How much of a packet that got sent is unknown; the socket is therefore to be closed whenever a time-out has occurred (see send_timeout_close below). Defaults to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 指定最长时间等待基础TCP堆栈接受发送操作。当超过限制时，发送操作将返回 {error,timeout} 。未知发送了多少数据包；因此，只要发生超时，套接字 send_timeout_close 关闭（请参见下面的send_timeout_close）。默认为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a protocol for Erlang distribution:
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang发行协议。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a textual comment describing the service. This comment shows up as the service description in the Windows service manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定描述服务的文本注释。此注释在Windows服务管理器中显示为服务描述。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extra environment for the emulator. The environment variables specified here are added to the system-wide environment block that is normally present when a service starts up. Variables present in both the system-wide environment and in the service environment specification will be set to the value specified in the service.
trans-unit.target: 指定模拟器的额外环境。此处指定的环境变量将添加到服务启动时通常存在的系统范围环境块中。系统范围环境和服务环境规范中都存在的变量将被设置为服务中指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternative to rsh for starting a slave node on a remote host; see slave(3).
trans-unit.target: 指定用于在远程主机上启动从属节点的 rsh 的替代方法；参见 slave(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an alternative to ssh for starting a slave node on a remote host; see slave(3).

Specifies an output format. Whether the output is returned or written to file depends on whether or not option return is specified. When written to file, the resulting file(s) will have extensions .D, .F, .erl, and .hrl respectively, basenames defaulting to dictionary if the input dictionary is literal and does not specify @name. When returned, results are in the order of the corresponding format options. Format options default to erl and hrl (in this order) if unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出格式。返回输出还是写入文件取决于是否指定了选项 return 。当写入文件时，生成的文件将分别具有扩展名 .D ， .F ， .erl 和 .hrl ，如果输入字典是文字的并且没有指定 @name ，则默认使用基名作为 dictionary 。返回时，结果按相应格式选项的顺序排列。如果未指定，则格式选项默认为 erl 和 hrl （按此顺序）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies another format string to be used in the strftime C library call. That is, specifying this to "%e-%b-%Y, %T %Z" gives log messages with time stamps like 15-May-2003, 10:23:04 MET. For more information, see the documentation for the C library function strftime. Defaults to "%a %b %e %T %Z %Y".
trans-unit.target: 指定在 strftime C库调用中使用的另一个格式字符串。也就是说，将其指定为 "%e-%b-%Y, %T %Z" 会给日志消息添加时间戳，例如 15-May-2003, 10:23:04 MET 。有关更多信息，请参见C库函数 strftime 的文档。默认为 "%a %b %e %T %Z %Y" 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies any data related to the test case. This data can be retrieved at any time using the ct:userdata/3 utility function.
trans-unit.target: 指定与测试用例相关的任何数据。可以随时使用 ct:userdata/3 实用程序功能检索此数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifies configuration variables required by the test case. If the required configuration variables are not found in any of the test system configuration files, the test case is skipped.
trans-unit.target: 指定测试用例所需的配置变量。如果在任何一个测试系统配置文件中没有找到所需的配置变量,则跳过测试用例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies directory Dir where all generated files are to be placed. If this option is omitted, the files are placed in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定目录 Dir ，其中将放置所有生成的文件。如果省略此选项，则文件将放置在当前目录中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how characters are input or output from or to the I/O device, implying that, for example, a terminal is set to handle Unicode input and output or a file is set to handle UTF-8 data encoding.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符如何从I/O设备输入或输出,意味着,例如,终端被设置为处理Unicode输入和输出,或者文件被设置为处理UTF-8数据编码。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long time (in milliseconds) the init process is allowed to spend shutting down the system. If Time milliseconds have elapsed, all processes still existing are killed. Defaults to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 指定允许 init 进程关闭系统的时间（以毫秒为单位）。如果 Time 毫秒过去了，仍然存在的所有进程被杀死。默认为 infinity 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how much memory is to be allocated for the internal compression state: MemLevel=1 uses minimum memory but is slow and reduces compression ratio; MemLevel=9 uses maximum memory for optimal speed. Defaults to 8.
trans-unit.target: 指定要为内部压缩状态分配多少内存： MemLevel = 1使用最少的内存，但速度较慢并降低了压缩率； MemLevel = 9使用最大内存以获得最佳速度。默认为8。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the parts of the original string are presented in the result list. Valid types:
trans-unit.target: 指定原始字符串的各部分在结果列表中的显示方式。有效类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if os_sup is to be started or not.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要启动 os_sup 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if and how the audit trail log shall be repaired when opened. Unless this parameter has the value snmp_repair it is sent to disk_log. If, on the other hand, the value is snmp_repair, snmp attempts to handle certain faults on its own. And even if it cannot repair the file, it does not truncate it directly, but instead moves it aside for later off-line analysis.
trans-unit.target: 指定在打开时是否以及如何修复审核跟踪日志。除非此参数的值为 snmp_repair ,否则它将发送到 disk_log 。另一方面，如果值为 snmp_repair ，则snmp尝试自行处理某些故障。即使无法修复文件，它也不会直接截断文件，而是将其移到一边以供以后进行离线分析。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if logging is to be ended if rb encounters an unprintable report. (You can get a report with an incorrect form if function error_logger, error_msg, or info_msg has been called with an invalid format string)
trans-unit.target: 指定如果 rb 遇到不可打印的报告，是否要结束日志记录。（如果使用无效的格式字符串调用了 error_logger ， error_msg 或 info_msg 函数，则可能会得到格式错误的报告）

trans-unit.source: Specifies if messages will be sent to error_logger on recoverable errors with the log files. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否将日志文件中的可恢复错误消息发送到 error_logger 。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the analysis should be sorted according to the ACC column, which is the default, or the OWN column. See Analysis Format below.
trans-unit.target: 指定是根据默认的ACC列还是OWN列对分析进行排序。请参阅下面的 Analysis Format 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the audit trail log entries will be (sequence) numbered or not. The range of the sequence numbers are according to RFC 5424, i.e. 1 through 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: 指定审计跟踪日志条目是否会被(序列)编号。序列号的范围根据RFC 5424,即1到2147483647。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the client is to try to reuse sessions when possible.
trans-unit.target: 指定客户端是否要在可能的情况下尝试重用会话。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the log is to be opened in read-only or read-write mode. Defaults to read_write.
trans-unit.target: 指定是以只读还是读写模式打开日志。默认为 read_write 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the server is to agree to reuse sessions when requested by the clients. See also option reuse_session.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务器是否应客户端请求同意重用会话。另请参阅选项 reuse_session 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the slave node is to be killed if a time-out occurs during initialization or startup. Defaults to true. Notice that the node can also be still alive it the boot time-out occurred, but it is not killed in this case.
trans-unit.target: 指定在初始化或启动期间发生超时时是否要杀死从节点。默认为 true 。请注意，该节点在引导超时发生时也可以保持活动状态，但是在这种情况下不会被杀死。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if the slave node is to be stopped if the master node stops. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果主节点停止，则从节点是否要停止。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies if to reject renegotiation attempt that does not live up to RFC 5746. By default secure_renegotiate is set to true, that is, secure renegotiation is enforced. If set to false secure renegotiation will still be used if possible, but it falls back to insecure renegotiation if the peer does not support RFC 5746.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否拒绝不符合 RFC 5746 的重新协商尝试。默认情况下， secure_renegotiate 设置为 true ，即强制执行安全重新协商。如果设置为 false ,则在可能的情况下仍将使用安全重新协商，但如果对等方不支持 RFC 5746 ，它将退回到不安全重新协商。

trans-unit.source: Specifies include directories (described earlier).
trans-unit.target: 指定包括的目录(前面有介绍)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies specifically that \R is to match all the Unicode newline characters (including CRLF, and so on, the default).
trans-unit.target: 特别指定/R要匹配所有Unicode换行字符(包括CRLF等,默认)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies specifically that \R is to match all the Unicode newline characters (including CRLF, and so on, the default). (Overrides the compilation option.)
trans-unit.target: 特别指定/R要匹配所有Unicode换行字符(包括CRLF等,默认)。(覆盖编译选项。)

trans-unit.source: Specifies specifically that \R is to match only the CR LF, or CRLF sequences, not the Unicode-specific newline characters. (Overrides the compilation option.)
trans-unit.target: 特别指定/R只匹配CR LF或CRLF序列,而不是Unicode特定的换行字符。(覆盖编译选项。)

trans-unit.source: Specifies specifically that \R is to match only the CR, LF, or CRLF sequences, not the Unicode-specific newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 特别指定/R只匹配CR、LF或CRLF序列,而不是Unicode特定的换行字符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that Unicode character properties are to be used when resolving \B, \b, \D, \d, \S, \s, \W and \w. Without this flag, only ISO Latin-1 properties are used. Using Unicode properties hurts performance, but is semantically correct when working with Unicode characters beyond the ISO Latin-1 range.
trans-unit.target: 指定在解析/B、/b、/D、/d、/S、/s、/W和/w时使用Unicode字符属性。如果没有这个标志,则只使用ISO拉丁-1属性。使用Unicode属性会影响性能,但在处理ISO Latin-1范围以外的Unicode字符时,语义上是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a tracer module is to be called instead of sending a trace message. The tracer module can then ignore or change the trace message. For more details on how to write a tracer module, see erl_tracer(3).
trans-unit.target: 指定要调用跟踪器模块，而不是发送跟踪消息。跟踪器模块然后可以忽略或更改跟踪消息。有关如何编写跟踪器模块的更多详细信息，请参见 erl_tracer(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that empty parts at the end of the result list are to be disregarded. The same as specifying {parts,0}. This corresponds to the default behavior of the split built-in function in Perl.
trans-unit.target: 指定不考虑结果列表末尾的空白部分。与指定 {parts,0} 相同。这对应于Perl中 split 内置函数的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that output from the Erlang shell is to be sent to a "debug log". The log file is named <servicename>.debug or <servicename>.debug.<N>, where <N> is an integer from 1 through 99. The log file is placed in the working directory of the service (as specified in WorkDir).
trans-unit.target: 指定将来自Erlang Shell的输出发送到“调试日志”。日志文件名为<servicename> .debug 或<servicename> .debug. <N>，其中<N>是1到99之间的整数。日志文件放置在服务的工作目录中（如 WorkDir 中所指定）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the (*UTF) and/or (*UTF8) "start-of-pattern items" are forbidden. This flag cannot be combined with option unicode. Useful if ISO Latin-1 patterns from an external source are to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 指定禁止（* UTF）和/或（* UTF8）“图案开始项”。该标志不能与 unicode 选项结合使用。如果要编译来自外部源的ISO Latin-1模式，则很有用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the end of the subject string is not the end of a line, so the dollar metacharacter is not to match it nor (except in multiline mode) a newline immediately before it. Setting this without multiline (at compile time) causes dollar never to match. This option affects only the behavior of the dollar metacharacter. It does not affect \Z or \z.
trans-unit.target: 指定主题字符串的结尾不是行的结尾，因此美元元字符既不匹配它，也不匹配（在多行模式下除外）紧接在它前面的换行符。将其设置为不使用 multiline （在编译时）会导致美元无法匹配。此选项仅影响美元元字符的行为。它不会影响\ Z或\ z。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the first character of the subject string is not the beginning of a line, so the circumflex metacharacter is not to match before it. Setting this without multiline (at compile time) causes circumflex never to match. This option only affects the behavior of the circumflex metacharacter. It does not affect \A.
trans-unit.target: 指定主题字符串的第一个字符不是行的开头，因此抑扬音元字符在它之前不匹配。设置为不使用 multiline （在编译时）会导致抑扬符永远不会匹配。此选项仅影响扬抑符元字符的行为。它不会影响\ A。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that trace to process or port shall be done instead of trace to file. This option is only allowed with the start option, but not with the {file, Filename} option.
trans-unit.target: 指定应完成对进程或端口的跟踪，而不是对文件的跟踪。此选项仅与 start 选项一起使用，而 {file, Filename} 选项则不允许。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the IP addresses for the hosts on which Erlang boot servers are running, see erl_boot_server(3). This flag is mandatory if flag -loader inet is present.
Specifies the IP addresses for the hosts on which Erlang boot servers are running, see erl_boot_server(3). This flag is mandatory if flag -loader inet is present.
trans-unit.target: 指定运行Erlang引导服务器的主机的IP地址，请参阅 erl_boot_server(3) 。如果存在标志 -loader inet ,则此标志是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Windows-internal service name (not the display name, which is the one erlsrv uses to identify the service).
trans-unit.target: 指定Windows内部服务名称（不是显示名称，这是 erlsrv 用来标识服务的名称）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application callback module and a start argument, see application(3).
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序回调模块和一个开始参数，请参阅 application(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the channel process to handle an SFTP subsystem.
trans-unit.target: 指定处理SFTP子系统的通道进程。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the configuration for Logger, except the primary log level, which is specified with logger_level, and the compatibility with SASL Error Logging, which is specified with logger_sasl_compatible.

Specifies the configuration for Logger, except the primary log level, which is specified with logger_level, and the compatibility with SASL Error Logging, which is specified with logger_sasl_compatible.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Logger 的配置（主日志级别由 logger_level 指定）以及与 SASL Error Logging 的兼容性（由 logger_sasl_compatible 指定）除外。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the cookie of the Erlang runtime system. This flag is mandatory if flag -loader inet is present.
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang运行时系统的cookie。如果存在标志 -loader inet ,则此标志是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the destination for the analysis. If this option is not given or it is dest, the destination will be the caller's group leader, otherwise the destination Dest is either the pid() of an I/O device or a filename. And, finally, if the filename is [] - "fprof.analysis" is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 指定分析的目标。如果未提供此选项或它是 dest ，则目的地将是呼叫者的组长，否则目的地 Dest 是I / O设备的 pid() 或文件名。最后，如果文件名是 [] - 则使用 "fprof.analysis" 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the destination for the trace text dump. If this option is not given, no dump is generated, if it is dump the destination will be the caller's group leader, otherwise the destination Dump is either the pid of an I/O device or a filename. And, finally, if the filename is [] - "fprof.dump" is used instead. This option is not allowed with the stop option.
trans-unit.target: 指定跟踪文本转储的目标。如果未指定此选项，则不会生成任何转储，如果是 dump 则目标将是调用方的组长，否则目标 Dump 是I / O设备的pid或文件名。最后，如果文件名是 [] - 则使用 "fprof.dump" 。 stop 选项不允许使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the destination to write the formatted text. Default destination is standard_io, but a filename can also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定写入格式化文本的目的地。默认目的地是 standard_io ，但是也可以指定文件名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the directory in which the CRLs can be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定查找CRL的目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the encoding of the generated file.
trans-unit.target: 指定生成文件的编码。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the encryption or decryption applied to tar files when using open_tar/3 or open_tar/4.
Specifies the end of an ifdef, an ifndef directive, or the end of an if or elif directive.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ifdef ， ifndef 指令的结尾或 if 或 elif 指令的结尾。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file name suffix to be used when a backup file is created; the default value is ".bak" (cf. the backups option).
trans-unit.target: 指定创建备份文件时要使用的文件名后缀；默认值为 ".bak" （请参见 backups 选项）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file name suffix to be used when a backup file is created; the default value is ".bak".
trans-unit.target: 指定创建备份文件时要使用的文件名后缀；默认值为 ".bak" 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the filename of the trace. If the option file is given, or none of these options are given, the file "fprof.trace" is used. This option is only allowed with the start option, but not with the {tracer, Tracer} option.
trans-unit.target: 指定跟踪的文件名。如果给出了选项 file ，或者没有给出这些选项，则使用文件 "fprof.trace" 。此选项仅允许使用 start 选项，而不能使用 {tracer, Tracer} 选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the filenames that are used for access files. When a request comes, every directory in the path to the requested asset are searched after files with the names specified by this parameter. If such a file is found, the file is parsed and the restrictions specified in it are applied to the request.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于访问文件的文件名。当有请求时,会搜索路径中通往所请求的资产的每个目录,并搜索具有该参数指定名称的文件。如果找到了这样的文件,就会对该文件进行解析,并将其中指定的限制应用于请求。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format handler to use. If this option is not specified, option handler that is specified when starting the tracer is used. If option handler is not specified when starting the tracer either, a default handler is used, which prints each trace message as a text line.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的格式处理程序。如果未指定此选项，则使用启动跟踪 handler 时指定的选项处理程序。如果在启动跟踪器时也未指定选项 handler 程序，则使用默认处理程序，该处理程序将每个跟踪消息打印为文本行。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the handler filters.
trans-unit.target: 指定处理程序的过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identity of the Erlang runtime system. If it is run as a distributed node, Id must be identical to the name supplied together with flag -sname or -name.
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang运行时系统的标识。如果作为分布式节点运行，则 Id 必须与标志 -sname 或 -name 一起提供的名称相同。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identity the client presents to the server. The matching secret is found by calling user_lookup_fun
Specifies the identity the client presents to the server. The matching secret is found by calling user_lookup_fun.
trans-unit.target: 指定客户端提供给服务器的身份。通过调用 user_lookup_fun 找到匹配的机密。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the initial array size; this also implies {fixed, true}. If N is not a non-negative integer, the call fails with reason badarg.
trans-unit.target: 指定初始数组大小；这也意味着 {fixed, true} 。如果 N 不是一个非负整数，则调用失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the log destination.

Specifies the log level for a TLS/DTLS connection. Alerts are logged on notice level, which is the default level. The level debug triggers verbose logging of TLS/DTLS protocol messages. See also ssl(6)
Specifies the log level for the handler, that is, log events that are equally or more severe than this level, are forwarded to the handler filters for this handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定处理程序的日志级别,即比这个级别同等或更严重的日志事件,都会转发到这个处理程序的处理程序过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the log name. This name must be passed on as a parameter in all subsequent logging operations. A name must always be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 指定日志名称。此名称必须在所有后续的日志记录操作中作为参数传递。必须始终提供一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum fragment length the client is prepared to accept from the server. See RFC 6066

Specifies the maximum number of attempts to authenticate a user before the user is blocked out. If a user successfully authenticates while blocked, the user receives a 403 (Forbidden) response from the server. If the user makes a failed attempt while blocked, the server returns 401 (Unauthorized), for security reasons. Default is 3. Can be set to infinity.
trans-unit.target: 指定在阻止用户之前对用户进行身份验证的最大尝试次数。如果用户在被阻止时成功进行了身份验证，则该用户会从服务器收到403（禁止）响应。如果用户在被阻止时尝试失败，则出于安全原因，服务器将返回401（未授权）。默认值为 3 。可以设置为无穷大。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the method used by erl_prim_loader to load Erlang modules into the system; see erl_prim_loader(3). Two Loader methods are supported:
trans-unit.target: 指定 erl_prim_loader 用来将Erlang模块加载到系统中的方法；参见 erl_prim_loader(3) 。支持两种 Loader 方法：

trans-unit.source: Specifies the module to use for registration and lookup of node names. Defaults to erl_epmd.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于注册和查找节点名称的模块。默认为 erl_epmd 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a configuration file, Config.config, which is used to configure applications; see app(4) and application(3).
trans-unit.target: 指定用于配置应用程序的配置文件 Config.config 的名称；参见 app(4) 和 application(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of one or more configuration files, Config.config, which is used to configure applications; see app(4) and application(3).

Specifies the name of the boot file, File.boot, which is used to start the system; see init(3). Unless File contains an absolute path, the system searches for File.boot in the current and $ROOT/bin directories.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于启动系统的引导文件的名称 File.boot ；参见 init(3) 。除非 File 包含绝对路径，否则系统 File.boot 在当前目录和 $ROOT/bin 目录中搜索File.boot。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the directory in which the output file is to be written. An empty string is interpreted as the current directory. By default, the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定要写入输出文件的目录名称。空字符串被解释为当前目录。默认情况下,使用当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the directory in which the output file is to be written. By default, the current directory is used. If the value is an empty string, the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定要写入输出文件的目录名称。默认情况下,使用当前目录。如果该值为空字符串,则使用当前目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the directory to which any generated stub module files are written. The default value is "stubs".
trans-unit.target: 指定将任何生成的存根模块文件写入的目录的名称。默认值为 "stubs" 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the file (without suffix) to which the resulting source code is to be written. By default, this is the same as the Name argument.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将结果源代码写入的文件名（不带后缀）。默认情况下，它与 Name 参数相同。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the file (without suffix) to which the resulting source code is to be written. If this option is not specified, the Name argument is used.
trans-unit.target: 指定要将结果源代码写入的文件名（不带后缀）。如果未指定此选项，则使用 Name 参数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the file from which the source code was taken. This is only used for generation of error reports. The default value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 指定取自源码的文件名。这只用于生成错误报告。默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the file to be used for logged terms. If this value is omitted and the log name is an atom or a string, the filename defaults to lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"]) for halt logs.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于记录术语的文件名。如果忽略此值，并且日志名称是原子或字符串，则文件名默认为 lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"]) 来暂停日志。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the loader used by erl_prim_loader. Loader can be efile (use the local file system) or inet (load using the boot_server on another Erlang node).
trans-unit.target: 指定 erl_prim_loader 使用的加载程序的名称。 Loader 可以是 efile （使用本地文件系统）或 inet （使用另一个Erlang节点上的 boot_server 加载）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of columns in the analysis text. If this option is not given the number of columns is set to 80.
trans-unit.target: 指定分析文本的列数。如果未给出此选项,则列数设置为80。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of minutes a failed user authentication is remembered. If a user authenticates after this time has passed, the previous failed authentications are forgotten. Default is 30.
trans-unit.target: 指定记住失败的用户认证的分钟数。如果经过此时间后用户进行身份验证，则将忘记先前失败的身份验证。默认值为 30 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of minutes a user is blocked. After this timehas passed, the user automatically regains access. Default is 60.
trans-unit.target: 指定阻止用户的分钟数。经过此时间后，用户将自动重新获得访问权限。默认值为 60 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of parts the subject string is to be split into.
trans-unit.target: 指定主题字符串要分割成的部分数量。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of seconds a successful user authentication is remembered. After this time has passed, the authentication is no longer reported. Default is 30.
trans-unit.target: 指定成功的用户认证被记住的秒数。经过此时间后，不再报告身份验证。默认值为 30 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the options for the SNMP note store.
trans-unit.target: 指定SNMP笔记存储的选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the options for the manager server process.
trans-unit.target: 指定管理器服务器进程的选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred maximum number of characters on any line, including indentation. The default value is 80.
trans-unit.target: 指定任何行的最大字符数,包括缩进。默认值为80。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred maximum number of characters on any line, not counting indentation. The default value is 65.
trans-unit.target: 指定任何行的最大字符数,不计缩进。默认值为65。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the primary filters.
trans-unit.target: 指定主过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the primary log level, that is, log event that are equally or more severe than this level, are forwarded to the primary filters. Less severe log events are immediately discarded.
trans-unit.target: 指定主要日志级别,即比该级别同等或更严重的日志事件将被转发到主要过滤器。不太严重的日志事件会被立即丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the primary log level. See the kernel(6) manual page for more information about this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定主日志级别。有关此参数的更多信息，请参见 kernel(6) 手册页。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the processes to be traced. Trace flags specified in this call specify what to trace on each process. This function can be called many times if you like different trace flags to be set on different processes.
trans-unit.target: 指定要跟踪的进程。在此调用中指定的跟踪标志指定了每个进程的跟踪内容。如果你想在不同的进程上设置不同的跟踪标志,这个函数可以被多次调用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the server identity hint, which the server presents to the client.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务器的身份提示,由服务器向客户端提出。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the short or long node name of the Erlang emulator. The Erlang services are always distributed. Default is to use the service name as (short) nodename.
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang模拟器的短或长节点名。Erlang服务始终是分布式的,默认使用服务名作为(短)节点名。默认情况下,使用服务名作为(短)节点名。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the audit trail log. This parameter is sent to disk_log.
trans-unit.target: 指定审核跟踪日志的大小。此参数发送到 disk_log 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the suffix to be used for the output file names; the default value is ".erl".
trans-unit.target: 指定用于输出文件名的后缀；默认值为 ".erl" 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout time for the request-keep-alive timer.
trans-unit.target: 指定请求保持有效的计时器的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of output file. Output_type is the same as the file extension of the output file, but without the period. This option is ignored by compilers that have a single output format.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的类型。 Output_type 与输出文件的文件扩展名相同，但没有句点。具有单一输出格式的编译器将忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the username and password to use to authenticate to the server.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于验证服务器的用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Specifies what happens to a log event if all filters return ignore, or if no filters exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果所有过滤器均返回 ignore 或不存在任何过滤器，则日志事件将如何处理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies what type of an audit trail log should be used. The effect of the type is actually different for the the agent and the manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定应该使用什么类型的审计跟踪日志。该类型对代理和经理的影响实际上是不同的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where shell output is to be sent. Default is that shell output is discarded. To be used only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 指定将shell输出发送到哪里。默认情况下,shell输出被丢弃。仅用于调试。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where the HTML log files are to be written.
trans-unit.target: 指定HTML日志文件的写入位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where the application Application = atom() can execute.
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序 Application = atom() 执行位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where the audit trail log should be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指定审计跟踪日志的存储位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where to send the trace messages. Tracer must be the process identifier of a local process or the port identifier of a local port.
trans-unit.target: 指定将跟踪消息发送到的位置。 Tracer 必须是本地进程的进程标识符或本地端口的端口标识符。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Erlang should start epmd on startup. By default this is true, but if you prefer to start epmd manually, set this to false.
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang是否应在启动时启动 epmd 。默认情况下为 true ，但是如果您希望手动启动epmd，请将其设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the disksup helper process should only use POSIX conformant commands (true) or not. The default is false. Setting this parameter to true can be necessary on embedded systems with stripped-down versions of Unix tools like df. The returned disk data and alarms can be different when using this option.
trans-unit.target: 指定 disksup helper进程是否应该仅使用符合POSIX的命令（ true ）。默认值为 false 。在具有精简版Unix工具（例如 df )的嵌入式系统上，可能需要将此参数设置为 true 。使用此选项时，返回的磁盘数据和警报可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the memsup process should only check system memory usage (true) or not. The default is false, meaning that information regarding both system memory usage and Erlang process memory usage is collected.
trans-unit.target: 指定 memsup 进程是否只应检查系统内存使用情况（ true ）。默认值为 false ，表示收集有关系统内存使用率和Erlang进程内存使用率的信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which captured (sub)patterns are to be returned. ValueSpec can either be an atom describing a predefined set of return values, or a list containing the indexes or the names of specific subpatterns to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的捕获（子）模式。 ValueSpec 可以是描述预定义的一组返回值的原子，也可以是包含要返回的特定子模式的索引或名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which captured substrings are returned and in what format. By default, run/3 captures all of the matching part of the substring and all capturing subpatterns (all of the pattern is automatically captured). The default return type is (zero-based) indexes of the captured parts of the string, specified as {Offset,Length} pairs (the indexType of capturing).
trans-unit.target: 指定以哪种格式返回捕获的子字符串。默认情况下， run/3 捕获子字符串的所有匹配部分和所有捕获子模式（所有模式都会自动捕获）。默认返回类型是字符串的捕获部分的索引（从零开始），指定为 {Offset,Length} 对（捕获的 index Type ）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which element in the stored tuples to use as key. By default, it is the first element, that is, Pos=1. However, this is not always appropriate. In particular, we do not want the first element to be the key if we want to store Erlang records in a table.
trans-unit.target: 指定存储的元组中的哪个元素用作键。默认情况下，它是第一个元素，即 Pos=1 。但是，这并不总是合适的。特别是，如果我们要将Erlang记录存储在表中，则我们不希望第一个元素成为键。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which flags are added to the parameters of the executable erl.
trans-unit.target: 指定将哪些标志添加到可执行文件 erl 的参数中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which local port number to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的本地端口号。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which other Erlang nodes the inet loader can use. This flag is mandatory if flag -loader inet is present. On each host, there must be on Erlang node with the erl_boot_server(3), which handles the load requests. Hosts is a list of IP addresses (hostnames are not acceptable).

Specifies which other Erlang nodes the inet loader can use. This flag is mandatory if flag -loader inet is present. On each host, there must be on Erlang node with the erl_boot_server(3), which handles the load requests. Hosts is a list of IP addresses (hostnames are not acceptable).
trans-unit.target: 指定 inet 加载程序可以使用的其他Erlang节点。如果存在标志 -loader inet ,则此标志是必需的。在每个主机上，必须在Erlang节点上带有 erl_boot_server(3) ，以处理加载请求。 Hosts 是IP地址的列表（主机名不可接受）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which processes that shall be traced. If this option is not given, the calling process is traced. All processes spawned by the traced processes are also traced. This option is only allowed with the start option.
trans-unit.target: 指定应跟踪的进程。如果未提供此选项，则跟踪调用过程。跟踪到的所有进程都将被跟踪。仅在 start 选项中允许使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify etype as one of the following constants:
trans-unit.target: 将 etype 指定为以下常量之一：

trans-unit.source: Specify a system file that Erlang is to read configuration data from. Format tells the parser how the file is to be interpreted:
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang要从中读取配置数据的系统文件。 Format 告诉解析器如何解释文件：

trans-unit.source: Specify a system file that Erlang is to read resolver configuration from for the internal DNS client inet_res(3), and monitor for changes, even if it does not exist. The path must be absolute.
trans-unit.target: 为内部DNS客户端 inet_res(3) 指定一个要从Erlang读取解析器配置的系统文件，并监视更改，即使该更改不存在。路径必须是绝对的。

trans-unit.source: Specify a system file that Erlang is to read resolver configuration from for the internal hosts file resolver, and monitor for changes, even if it does not exist. The path must be absolute.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个系统文件,即使内部主机文件解析器不存在,Erlang也要从该文件读取解析器配置,并监控其变化。路径必须是绝对的。

trans-unit.source: Specify a system registry that Erlang is to read configuration data from. win32 is the only valid option.
trans-unit.target: 指定Erlang要从中读取配置数据的系统注册表。 win32 是唯一有效的选项。

trans-unit.source: Specify breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 指定断点。

trans-unit.source: Specify how to perform lookup and caching of certificate revocation lists. Module defaults to ssl_crl_cache with DbHandle being internal and an empty argument list.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何执行证书吊销列表的查找和缓存。 Module 默认为 ssl_crl_cache 与 DbHandle 是 internal 和一个空的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: Specify include directories to be passed to the compiler for automatic compilation (similar to ct_run -include).
trans-unit.target: 指定要传递给编译器以进行自动编译的包含目录（类似于 ct_run -include ）。

trans-unit.source: Specify lookup methods and in which order to try them. The valid methods are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 指定查找方法和尝试的顺序。有效的方法如下:

trans-unit.source: Specify the Mnesia directory by providing an application parameter either when starting the Erlang shell or in the application script. Previously, the following example was used to create the directory for the Company database:
trans-unit.target: 通过在启动Erlang Shell或在应用程序脚本中提供应用程序参数来指定 Mnesia 目录。以前，以下示例用于创建 Company 数据库的目录：

trans-unit.source: Specify the hostname to be used in TLS Server Name Indication extension. If not specified it will default to the Host argument of connect/[3,4] unless it is of type inet:ipaddress().
trans-unit.target: 在TLS服务器名称指示扩展名中指定要使用的主机名。如果未指定，它将默认为 connect/[3,4] 的 Host 参数，除非它的类型为inet：ipaddress（）。

trans-unit.source: Specify the modules to be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要解释的模块。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the libraries with -lerl_interface -lei.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -lerl_interface -lei 指定库的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the library with -lei.
Specify the path to libei.a with -L$OTPROOT/lib/erl_interface-3.2.3/lib.
Specify the path to liberl_interface.a and libei.a with -L$OTPROOT/lib/erl_interface-3.2.3/lib.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -L$OTPROOT/lib/erl_interface-3.2.3/lib 指定 liberl_interface.a 和 libei.a 的路径。

trans-unit.source: Specify the top-level HTML log directory (similar to ct_run -logdir).
trans-unit.target: 指定顶级HTML日志目录（类似于 ct_run -logdir ）。

trans-unit.source: Specify which ASN.1 specs to compile in a module with extension .set.asn. Choose a module name and provide the names of the ASN.1 specs. For example, if you have the specs File1.asn, File2.asn, and File3.asn, your module MyModule.set.asn looks as follows:
trans-unit.target: 指定要在扩展名为 .set.asn 的模块中编译哪些ASN.1规范。选择一个模块名称，并提供ASN.1规范的名称。例如，如果您具有规格 File1.asn ， File2.asn 和 File3.asn ，则模块 MyModule.set.asn 如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Specifying 0 as the number of parts gives the same effect as option trim. If subexpressions are captured, empty subexpressions matched at the end are also stripped from the result if trim or {parts,0} is specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定 0 作为零件数具有与选项 trim 相同的效果。如果捕获了子表达式 {parts,0} 则在指定了 trim 或{parts，0}的情况下，也将从结果中去除末尾匹配的空子表达式。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a #diameter_callback{} record allows individual functions to be configured in place of the usual diameter_app(3) callbacks. See diameter_callback.erl for details.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定 #diameter_callback{} 记录，可以配置各个功能来代替常规的 diameter_app(3) 回调。有关详细信息，请参见 diameter_callback.erl _callback.erl。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a SetFun as an integer I is equivalent to specifying {external, fun(X) -> element(I, X) end}, but is to be preferred, as it makes it possible to handle this case even more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 将SetFun指定为整数I等效于指定 {external, fun(X) -> element(I, X) end} ，但是它是首选的，因为它可以更有效地处理这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a Vendor-Id in the definition of a grouped AVP is equivalent to specifying it with @avp_vendor_id.
trans-unit.target: 在分组的AVP的定义中指定Vendor-Id等同于使用 @avp_vendor_id 进行指定。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a capability as a transport option may be particularly appropriate for Inband-Security-Id, in case TLS is desired over TCP as implemented by diameter_tcp(3).
trans-unit.target: 将功能指定为传输选项可能特别适用于Inband-Security-Id，以防在 diameter_tcp(3) 希望通过TCP实现TLS的情况（如diameter_tcp（3）实施）。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default value for a required variable can result in a test case always getting executed. This might not be a desired behavior.
trans-unit.target: 为所需变量指定一个默认值会导致测试用例总是被执行。这可能不是一个理想的行为。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a lower value can result in matches with deep recursion failing, when they should have matched:
trans-unit.target: 指定一个较低的值可能会导致深层递归的匹配失败,而它们应该是匹配的。

trans-unit.source: Specifying caseless matching does not affect these escape sequences. For example, \p{Lu} always matches only uppercase letters. This is different from the behavior of current versions of Perl.
trans-unit.target: 指定无大小写匹配不会影响这些转义序列。例如,\p{Lu}总是只匹配大写字母。这与当前版本的Perl的行为不同。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the Mnesia directory where the database is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中存储数据库的 Mnesia 目录。

trans-unit.source: Specifying value 0 for Schedulers or SchedulersOnline resets the number of scheduler threads or scheduler threads online, respectively, to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 为 Schedulers 或 SchedulersOnline 指定值 0 分别将在线的调度程序线程或调度程序线程数重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Split large distribution messages into multiple fragments.
Splits List1 into List2 and List3. List2 contains the first N elements and List3 the remaining elements (the Nth tail).
trans-unit.target: 将 List1 分为 List2 和 List3 。 List2 包含前 N 个元素， List3 包含其余元素（第 N 个尾部）。

trans-unit.source: Splits Q1 in two. The N front items are put in Q2 and the rest in Q3.
trans-unit.target: 将 Q1 一分为二。该 N 前项放在 Q2 和休息 Q3 。

trans-unit.source: Splits String where SearchPattern is encountered and return the remaining parts. Where, default leading, indicates whether the leading, the trailing or all encounters of SearchPattern will split String.
trans-unit.target: 在遇到 SearchPattern 的地方拆分 String 并返回其余部分。 Where ，默认 leading 表示在其中， SearchPattern 的 leading ， trailing 还是 all 相遇都会拆分 String 。
